summary.span: 定义控件的基类，控件是带有可视化表示形式的组件。

span.span: Defines the base class for controls, which are components with visual representation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要创建自己的控件类，请从 、 类或从其他 Windows 窗体提供的控件继承。To create your own control class, inherit from the , classes, or from the other Windows Forms provided controls. 有关创作自定义控件的详细信息，请参阅[用 .NET Framework 开发自定义 Windows 窗体控件](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/developing-custom-windows-forms-controls)。For more information about authoring custom controls, see [Developing Custom Windows Forms Controls with the .NET Framework](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/developing-custom-windows-forms-controls). 类实现了向用户显示信息的类所需的非常基本的功能。The class implements very basic functionality required by classes that display information to the user. 它通过键盘和指针设备处理用户输入。It handles user input through the keyboard and pointing devices. 它处理消息路由和安全性。It handles message routing and security. 它定义控件的边界（其位置和大小），尽管它不实现绘制。It defines the bounds of a control (its position and size), although it does not implement painting. 它提供窗口句柄（`hWnd`）。It provides a window handle (`hWnd`). Windows 窗体控件使用环境属性，使子控件看起来就像它们的周围环境。Windows Forms controls use ambient properties so child controls can appear like their surrounding environment. *环境属性*是一个控件属性，如果未设置，则将从父控件中检索该属性。An *ambient property* is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control. 如果控件没有 ，并且未设置该属性，则控件会尝试通过 属性确定环境属性的值。If the control does not have a , and the property is not set, the control attempts to determine the value of the ambient property through the property. 如果该控件没有放置，则为; 如果该站点不支持环境属性，或者未在 上设置该属性，则该控件将使用其自己的默认值。If the control is not sited, if the site does not support ambient properties, or if the property is not set on the , the control uses its own default values. 通常，环境属性表示控件（如 ）传递给子控件的特性。Typically, an ambient property represents a characteristic of a control, such as , that is communicated to a child control. 例如，默认情况下， 将具有与其父 相同的 。For example, a will have the same as its parent by default. 类提供的环境属性包括： 、、、和 。Ambient properties provided by the class include: , , , , and . > [!NOTE] > 若要使 Windows 窗体的应用程序支持视觉样式，请确保将 属性设置为 `System`，并将清单包含在可执行文件中。To make your Windows Forms application support visual styles, be sure to set the property to `System` and include a manifest with your executable. 清单是一个 XML 文件，其中包含为应用程序可执行文件中的资源，或者作为与可执行文件位于同一目录中的单独文件。A manifest is an XML file that is included either as a resource within your application executable or as a separate file that resides in the same directory as the executable file. 有关清单的示例，请参见 枚举的 "示例" 部分。For an example of a manifest, see the Example section of the enumeration. 有关使用视觉样式的详细信息，请参阅[视觉样式](/windows/win32/controls/themes-overview)。For more information about using visual styles, see [Visual Styles](/windows/win32/controls/themes-overview). Windows 窗体内置了辅助功能支持，并提供了有关应用程序的信息，使其能够与辅助功能客户端应用程序（如屏幕弱视和审阅者实用程序、语音输入实用程序、屏幕键盘、备用输入设备和键盘增强实用程序）配合工作。Windows Forms has accessibility support built in, and provides information about your application that enables it to work with accessibility client applications such as screen enlarger and reviewer utilities, voice input utilities, on-screen keyboards, alternative input devices, and keyboard enhancement utilities. 有时，你将需要向具有辅助功能的客户端应用程序提供其他信息。Sometimes you will want to provide additional information to accessibility client applications. 提供此附加信息的方法有两种。There are two ways of providing this additional information. 可以设置 、、和 属性值，这些值将报告给具有辅助功能的客户端应用程序。You can set the , , , and property values, which will be reported to accessibility client applications. 此方法通常用于提供现有控件的有限辅助功能信息。This method is typically used to provide limited accessibility information for existing controls. 或者，你可以编写自己的派生自 或 类的类，并根据需要提供尽可能多的辅助功能信息。Alternatively, you can write your own class deriving from the or classes, providing as much accessibility information as needed. > [!NOTE] > 若要保持更好的性能，请不要在其构造函数中设置控件的大小。To maintain better performance, do not set the size of a control in its constructor. 首选方法是重写 属性。The preferred method is to override the property. > [!NOTE] > 不要在其构造函数中添加 的数据绑定。Do not add data bindings for a in its constructor. 这样做将导致代码生成出错，并可能导致意外的行为。Doing so will cause errors in code generation and can cause unwanted behavior. 命名空间中的大部分控件都使用基础 Windows 公共控件作为生成的基础。The majority of the controls in the namespace use the underlying Windows common control as a base to build on. 有关 Windows 公共控件的详细信息，请参阅[常规控件参考](/windows/win32/controls/common-control-reference)。For more information about the Windows common controls, see [General Control Reference](/windows/win32/controls/common-control-reference). 若要从单独的进程中标识 Windows 窗体控件，请使用标准的 `SendMessage` 调用来传递 WM_GETCONTROLNAME 消息。To identify Windows Forms controls from a separate process, use a standard `SendMessage` call to pass the WM_GETCONTROLNAME message. WM_GETCONTROLNAME 独立于语言和 Windows 层次结构。WM_GETCONTROLNAME is independent of the language and Windows hierarchy. 有关详细信息，请参阅[自动 Windows 窗体](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/articles/ms996405(v=msdn.10))中的 "Windows 窗体推荐的解决方案" 主题。For more information, see the "Recommended Solution for Windows Forms" topic in [Automating Windows Forms](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/articles/ms996405(v=msdn.10)). 使用 属性可以从多个线程同步对控件的访问。Use the property to synchronize access to the control from multiple threads. 有关多线程 Windows 窗体控件的详细信息，请参阅[如何：对 Windows 窗体控件进行线程安全调用](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-make-thread-safe-calls-to-windows-forms-controls)For more information about multithreaded Windows Forms controls, see [How to: Make Thread-Safe Calls to Windows Forms Controls](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-make-thread-safe-calls-to-windows-forms-controls)

threadsafe.span: 只有以下成员是线程安全的： 、、、和 （如果已创建控件的句柄）。

span.span: Only the following members are thread safe: , , , , and if the handle for the control has already been created.

threadsafe.span: 在后台线程上创建控件句柄之前调用 可能导致非法的跨线程调用。

span.span: Calling before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是 Windows 窗体应用程序中使用的所有控件的基类。The class is the base class for all controls used in a Windows Forms application. 因为该类通常不用于创建类的实例，所以通常不直接调用此构造函数，而是由派生类调用。Because this class is not typically used to create an instance of the class, this constructor is typically not called directly but is instead called by a derived class.

span.span: Notifies the accessibility client applications of the specified for the specified child control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须为每个要通知的辅助功能客户端应用程序 调用 方法。You must call the method for each the accessibility client applications are to be notified of. 当设置属性或从事件处理程序中设置属性时，通常会调用 方法。The method is typically called when a property is set or from within an event handler. 例如，你可以调用 方法，并传入 事件的事件处理程序中的 `Hide` 的 值。For example, you might call the method and pass in an value of `Hide` from within the event handler for the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 和 类创建可访问感知的图表控件，以公开辅助性信息。The following code example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控件将两条曲线与图例一起绘制。The control plots two curves along with a legend. 从 `ControlAccessibleObject`派生的 `ChartControlAccessibleObject` 类在 方法中用于为图表控件提供自定义的可访问信息。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 由于图表图例不是实际的基于 的控件，而是由图表控件绘制，因此它不具有任何内置的可访问信息。Since the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not any built-in accessible information. 因此，`ChartControlAccessibleObject` 类会重写 方法，以返回表示图例的每个部分的可访问信息的 `CurveLegendAccessibleObject`。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 当可访问感知的应用程序使用此控件时，控件可以提供必需的可访问信息。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此代码摘录演示了如何调用 方法。This code excerpt demonstrates calling the method. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅 类概述。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CPP/chartcontrol.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CS/chartcontrol.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/VB/chartcontrol.vb#5)]

summary.span: 获取或设置控件的默认操作说明以供具有辅助功能的客户端应用程序使用。

span.span: Gets or sets the default action description of the control for use by accessibility client applications.

value.span: 控件的默认操作说明，供辅助功能客户端应用程序使用。

span.span: The default action description of the control for use by accessibility client applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象的 属性介绍了从用户的角度来看对象的主要操作方法。An object's property describes the object's primary method of manipulation from the user's viewpoint. 此属性应为谓词或短动词短语。This property should be a verb or a short verb phrase. > [!NOTE] > 并非所有对象都有默认操作，一些对象可能具有与其 属性相关的默认操作，如以下示例中所示：Not all objects have default actions, and some objects might have a default action that is related to its property, such as in the following examples: - 选中的复选框的默认操作为 "取消选中" 且值为 "已选中"。A selected check box has a default action of "Uncheck" and a value of "Checked." - 清除的复选框的默认操作为 "检查"，值为 "未选中"。A cleared check box has a default action of "Check" and a value of "Unchecked." - 标记为 "Print" 的按钮的默认操作是 "按"，没有任何值。A button labeled "Print" has a default action of "Press," with no value. - 显示 "Printer" 的标签或文本框控件没有默认操作，但其值为 "Printer"。A label or a text box control that shows "Printer" has no default action, but would have a value of "Printer." 有关可访问对象的属性的详细信息，请参阅[描述性属性的内容](/windows/win32/winauto/content-of-descriptive-properties)。For more information about properties of accessible objects, see [Content of Descriptive Properties](/windows/win32/winauto/content-of-descriptive-properties).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象的 属性提供有关对象的视觉外观的文字说明。An object's property provides a textual description about an object's visual appearance. 描述主要用于为弱视用户或盲人用户提供更大的上下文，但也可用于上下文搜索或其他应用程序。The description is primarily used to provide greater context for low-vision or blind users, but can also be used for context searching or other applications. 如果说明不明显，或者根据对象的 、、和 属性，则需要 属性。The property is needed if the description is not obvious, or if it is redundant based on the object's , , , and properties. 例如，带有 "确定" 的按钮不需要其他信息，而显示仙人掌图片的按钮会。For example, a button with "OK" would not need additional information, but a button that shows a picture of a cactus would. 仙人掌按钮的 "" 和 "" （可能 ）属性将说明其用途，但 "" 属性会传达不太有形的信息，例如 "显示仙人掌图片的按钮"。The , and (and perhaps ) properties for the cactus button would describe its purpose, but the property would convey information that is less tangible, such as "A button that shows a picture of a cactus." 有关可访问对象的属性的详细信息，请参阅[描述性属性的内容](/windows/win32/winauto/content-of-descriptive-properties)。For more information about properties of accessible objects, see [Content of Descriptive Properties](/windows/win32/winauto/content-of-descriptive-properties). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 派生类的实例，`MyCheckBox`，为其 属性分配 ，并设置 和 属性，因为 属性是 `null`的。The following code example creates an instance of a derived class, `MyCheckBox`, assigns it an to its property and sets the and properties, because the property is `null`. 此示例要求你有一个名为 `MyForm`的 。This example requires that you have a named `MyForm`. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用户能够将图像或图像文件拖到窗体上，并在删除它时显示它。The following code example enables the user to drag an image or image file onto the form, and have it be displayed at the point on it is dropped. 重写 方法，以便在每次绘制窗体时重绘图像;否则，只有在下一次重画时才会保留图像。The method is overridden to repaint the image each time the form is painted; otherwise the image would only persist until the next repainting. 事件处理方法确定要拖动到窗体中的数据的类型，并提供相应的反馈。The event-handling method determines the type of data being dragged into the form and provides the appropriate feedback. 如果可从数据创建 ，则 事件处理方法将显示窗体上的图像。The event-handling method displays the image on the form, if an can be created from the data. 由于 和 值是屏幕坐标，因此该示例使用 方法将它们转换为客户端坐标。Because the and values are screen coordinates, the example uses the method to convert them to client coordinates. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可定义控件在其父控件调整大小时自动调整大小的方式。Use the property to define how a control is automatically resized as its parent control is resized. 将控件锚定到其父控件可确保在调整父控件的大小时，定位边缘与父控件边缘的相对位置保持不变。Anchoring a control to its parent control ensures that the anchored edges remain in the same position relative to the edges of the parent control when the parent control is resized. 可以将控件锚定到其容器的一个或多个边缘。You can anchor a control to one or more edges of its container. 例如，如果您的 的 的 属性值设置为 `Top` 和 `Bottom`，则 会拉伸以保持与 的上边缘和下边缘的定位距离，因为 的 增加。For example, if you have a with a whose property value is set to `Top` and `Bottom`, the is stretched to maintain the anchored distance to the top and bottom edges of the as the of the is increased. > [!NOTE] > 和 属性互相排斥。The and properties are mutually exclusive. 一次只能设置一个，而最后一个集则优先。Only one can be set at a time, and the last one set takes precedence. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 添加到窗体中，并设置其一些公共属性。The following code example adds a to a form and sets some of its common properties. 该示例将按钮锚定在窗体右下角，以便在调整窗体大小时保持其相对位置。The example anchors the button to the bottom-right corner of the form so it keeps its relative position as the form is resized. 接下来，它设置 ，并将按钮的大小调整为与 相同。Next it sets the and resizes the button to the same size as the . 然后，该示例将 设置为 `true` 并设置 属性。The example then sets the to `true` and sets the property. 最后，添加一个事件处理程序来处理按钮的 事件。Lastly, it adds an event handler to handle the event of the button. 此示例要求你有一个名为 `imageList1`的 。This example requires that you have an named `imageList1`. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CPP/controlproperties.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CS/controlproperties.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/VB/controlproperties.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非 的 `SupportsTransparentBackColor` 值设置为 `true`，否则 属性不支持透明颜色。The property does not support transparent colors unless the `SupportsTransparentBackColor` value of is set to `true`. 属性是环境属性。The property is an ambient property. 环境属性是一个控件属性，如果未设置，则将从父控件中检索该属性。An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control. 例如，默认情况下， 将具有与其父 相同的 。For example, a will have the same as its parent by default. 有关环境属性的详细信息，请参阅 类或 类概述。For more information about ambient properties, see the class or the class overview. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将控件的 和 设置为默认系统颜色。The following code example sets the and of the controls to the default system colors. 如果控件有任何子控件，则代码会以递归方式调用自身。The code recursively calls itself if the control has any child controls. 此代码示例要求具有至少一个子控件的 ;但是，子容器控件（如 或 ，具有其自己的子控件）可以更好地演示递归。This code example requires that you have a with at least one child control; however, a child container control, like a or , with its own child control(s) would better demonstrate the recursion. remarks.format: ## Remarks - 使用 "" 属性将图形图像放置到控件上。Use the property to place a graphic image onto a control. > [!NOTE] > Windows 窗体控件作为背景图像不支持透明或透明颜色的图像。Images with translucent or transparent colors are not supported by Windows Forms controls as background images. > > `true` 属性的子控件不支持此属性。This property is not supported on child controls whose property is `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 添加到窗体中，并设置其一些公共属性。The following code example adds a to a form and sets some of its common properties. 该示例将按钮锚定在窗体右下角，以便在调整窗体大小时保持其相对位置。The example anchors the button to the bottom-right corner of the form so it keeps its relative position as the form is resized. 接下来，它设置 ，并将按钮的大小调整为与 相同。Next it sets the and resizes the button to the same size as the . 然后，该示例将 设置为 `true` 并设置 属性。The example then sets the to `true` and sets the property. 最后，添加一个事件处理程序来处理按钮的 事件。Lastly, it adds an event handler to handle the event of the button. 此示例要求你有一个名为 `imageList1`的 。This example requires that you have an named `imageList1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性以编程方式或通过用户交互发生更改，则会引发此事件。This event is raised if the property changes either programmatically or by user interaction. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到一个项目中，该项目包含继承自 的类型的实例，如 或 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后，将该实例命名为 `Control1` 并确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 在创建控件的基础句柄的线程上异步执行委托。

span.span: Executes a delegate asynchronously on the thread that the control's underlying handle was created on.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginInvoke(class System.Delegate method) cil managed
Public Function BeginInvoke (method As Delegate) As IAsyncResult

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: method
param.span: 对不带参数的方法的委托。

span.span: A delegate to a method that takes no parameters.

summary.span: 在创建控件的基础句柄所在线程上异步执行指定委托。

span.span: Executes the specified delegate asynchronously on the thread that the control's underlying handle was created on.

returns.span: 一个表示 操作的结果的 。

span.span: An that represents the result of the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 委托是异步调用的，并且此方法会立即返回。The delegate is called asynchronously, and this method returns immediately. 可以从任何线程（甚至是控件句柄的线程）调用此方法。You can call this method from any thread, even the thread that owns the control's handle. 如果该控件的句柄尚不存在，则此方法将在该控件的父链中向上搜索，直到找到具有窗口句柄的控件或窗体。If the control's handle does not exist yet, this method searches up the control's parent chain until it finds a control or form that does have a window handle. 如果找不到合适的句柄， 会引发异常。If no appropriate handle can be found, will throw an exception. 委托方法中的异常被视为未捕获，并将发送到应用程序的未捕获异常处理程序。Exceptions within the delegate method are considered untrapped and will be sent to the application's untrapped exception handler. 如果必要，则可以调用 来检索委托的返回值，但这不是必需的。You can call to retrieve the return value from the delegate, if neccesary, but this is not required. 将被阻止，直到返回值可以检索为止。 will block until the return value can be retrieved. > [!NOTE] > 控件的大多数方法只能从创建控件的线程调用。Most methods on a control can only be called from the thread where the control was created. 除了 属性，控件上有四种线程安全方法： 、、和 （如果已创建控件的句柄）。In addition to the property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: , , , and if the handle for the control has already been created. 在后台线程上创建控件句柄之前调用 可能导致非法的跨线程调用。Calling before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls. 对于所有其他方法调用，应使用调用方法之一封送对控件线程的调用。For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread. 调用方法始终在控件的线程上调用其回调。The invoke methods always invoke their callbacks on the control's thread. > [!NOTE] > 如果应处理消息的线程不再处于活动状态，则可能会引发异常。An exception might be thrown if the thread that should process the message is no longer active. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates a use of the method. [!code-cpp[Control_BeginInvoke#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_BeginInvoke/CPP/control_begininvoke.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Control_BeginInvoke#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_BeginInvoke/CS/control_begininvoke.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Control_BeginInvoke#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_BeginInvoke/VB/control_begininvoke.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 委托是异步调用的，并且此方法会立即返回。The delegate is called asynchronously, and this method returns immediately. 可以从任何线程（甚至是控件句柄的线程）调用此方法。You can call this method from any thread, even the thread that owns the control's handle. 如果该控件的句柄尚不存在，则此方法将在该控件的父链中向上搜索，直到找到具有窗口句柄的控件或窗体。If the control's handle does not exist yet, this method searches up the control's parent chain until it finds a control or form that does have a window handle. 如果找不到合适的句柄， 会引发异常。If no appropriate handle can be found, will throw an exception. 委托方法中的异常被视为未捕获，并将发送到应用程序的未捕获异常处理程序。Exceptions within the delegate method are considered untrapped and will be sent to the application's untrapped exception handler. 如果必要，则可以调用 来检索委托的返回值，但这不是必需的。You can call to retrieve the return value from the delegate, if neccesary, but this is not required. 将被阻止，直到返回值可以检索为止。 will block until the return value can be retrieved. > [!NOTE] > 控件的大多数方法只能从创建控件的线程调用。Most methods on a control can only be called from the thread where the control was created. 除了 属性，控件上有四种线程安全方法： 、、和 （如果已创建控件的句柄）。In addition to the property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: , , , and if the handle for the control has already been created. 在后台线程上创建控件句柄之前调用 可能导致非法的跨线程调用。Calling before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls. 对于所有其他方法调用，应使用调用方法之一封送对控件线程的调用。For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread. 调用方法始终在控件的线程上调用其回调。The invoke methods always invoke their callbacks on the control's thread. > [!NOTE] > 如果应处理消息的线程不再处于活动状态，则可能会引发异常。An exception might be thrown if the thread that should process the message is no longer active. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates a use of the method. summary.span: 获取或设置控件（包括其非工作区元素）相对于其父控件的大小和位置（以像素为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the size and location of the control including its nonclient elements, in pixels, relative to the parent control.

value.span: 相对于父控件的 ，表示控件（包括其非工作区元素）的大小和位置（以像素为单位）。

span.span: A in pixels relative to the parent control that represents the size and location of the control including its nonclient elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件的边界包括非工作区元素，例如滚动条、边框、标题栏和菜单。The bounds of the control include the nonclient elements such as scroll bars, borders, title bars, and menus. 调用 方法来设置 属性。The method is called to set the property. 属性并不始终通过其 `set` 方法进行更改，因此您应该重写 方法，以确保在设置 属性时执行您的代码。The property is not always changed through its `set` method so you should override the method to ensure that your code is executed when the property is set. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在窗体上创建三个 控件，并使用各种与大小相关的和与位置相关的属性设置其大小和位置。The following code example creates three controls on a form and sets their size and location by using the various size-related and location-related properties. 此示例要求有一个宽度和高度至少为300像素的 。This example requires that you have a that has a width and height of at least 300 pixels. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示控件是否已捕获鼠标。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control has captured the mouse.

value.span: 如果控件已捕获鼠标，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control has captured the mouse; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件已捕获鼠标时，它将接收鼠标输入，无论光标是否在其边框内。When a control has captured the mouse, it receives mouse input whether or not the cursor is within its borders. 通常仅在拖动操作期间捕获鼠标。The mouse is typically only captured during drag operations. 只有前景窗口才能捕获鼠标。Only the foreground window can capture the mouse. 当后台窗口尝试执行此操作时，窗口仅接收鼠标光标位于窗口可见部分内时发生的鼠标事件的消息。When a background window attempts to do so, the window receives messages only for mouse events that occur when the mouse cursor is within the visible portion of the window. 此外，即使前景窗口已捕获鼠标，用户仍可以单击其他窗口，使其成为前台。Also, even if the foreground window has captured the mouse, the user can still click another window, bringing it to the foreground. 捕获鼠标时，快捷键不起作用。When the mouse is captured, shortcut keys should not work. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 的属性。The following code example demonstrates the property. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为 label1 的 的窗体中，并使用两个名为 listbox1 和 listbox2 的 控件To run this example paste the following code in a form containing a named label1 and two controls named listbox1 and listbox2. 请确保窗体和控件的 事件与此示例中的方法相关联。Ensure the form and controls' event is associated with the method in this example. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否捕获对错误线程的调用，这些调用在调试应用程序时访问控件的 属性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to catch calls on the wrong thread that access a control's property when an application is being debugged.

value.span: 如果捕获了对错误线程的调用，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if calls on the wrong thread are caught; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当某个线程不是控件的创建线程尝试访问该控件的一个或多个属性时，这通常会导致不可预知的结果。When a thread other than the creating thread of a control tries to access one of that control's methods or properties, it often leads to unpredictable results. 常见的无效线程活动是对访问控件的 属性的错误线程的调用。A common invalid thread activity is a call on the wrong thread that accesses the control's property. 将 设置为 `true` 可在调试时更轻松地查找和诊断此线程活动。Set to `true` to find and diagnose this thread activity more easily while debugging.

summary.span: 在单击控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件会将 传递给其事件处理程序，因此它只指示发生了单击操作。The event passes an to its event handler, so it only indicates that a click has occurred. 如果需要更具体的鼠标信息（按钮、点击数、滚轮旋转或位置），请使用 事件。If you need more specific mouse information (button, number of clicks, wheel rotation, or location), use the event. 但是，如果单击是由除鼠标之外的操作引起的，则不会引发 事件，如按 ENTER 键。However, the event will not be raised if the click is caused by action other than that of the mouse, such as pressing the ENTER key. 双击由用户操作系统的鼠标设置确定。A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system. 用户可以设置两次单击鼠标按钮之间的时间以便将这两次单击认为是双击而不是两次单击。The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click rather than two clicks. 每次双击控件时都会引发 事件。The event is raised every time a control is double-clicked. 例如，如果您具有 的 和 事件的事件处理程序，则在双击窗体并调用这两个方法时，将引发 和 事件。For example, if you have event handlers for the and events of a , the and events are raised when the form is double-clicked and both methods are called. 如果双击控件，而该控件不支持 事件，则 事件可能会引发两次。If a control is double-clicked and that control does not support the event, the event might be raised twice. 必须将 的 `StandardClick` 值设置为 "`true`，以便引发此事件。You must set the `StandardClick` value of to `true` for this event to be raised. > [!NOTE] > 除非 集合中至少有一个 ，否则不会为 类引发以下事件： 、、、、、、 和 。The following events are not raised for the class unless there is at least one in the collection: , , , , , , and . 如果集合中至少有一个 ，并且用户与选项卡控件的标头（显示 名称）交互， 将引发相应的事件。If there is at least one in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the names appear), the raises the appropriate event. 但是，如果用户交互位于选项卡页的工作区中，则 引发相应的事件。However, if the user interaction is within the client area of the tab page, the raises the appropriate event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## the `StandardClick` or `StandardDoubleClick` values of to `true` can cause unexpected behavior or have no effect at all if the control does not support the or events. 下表列出 Windows 窗体控件以及为响应指定的鼠标操作而引发的事件（ 或 ）。The following table lists Windows Forms controls and which event ( or ) is raised in response to the mouse action specified. | 控件Control | 单击鼠标左键Left Mouse Click | remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件的工作区是控件的边界，而非工作区元素（如滚动条、边框、标题栏和菜单）的边界。The client area of a control is the bounds of the control, minus the nonclient elements such as scroll bars, borders, title bars, and menus. 因为客户端坐标相对于控件的工作区的左上角，所以此属性返回的矩形的左上角坐标为（0，0）。Because client coordinates are relative to the upper-left corner of the client area of the control, the coordinates of the upper-left corner of the rectangle returned by this property are (0,0). 您可以使用此属性来获取控件的工作区的大小和坐标（如在控件的图面上绘制）。You can use this property to obtain the size and coordinates of the client area of the control for tasks such as drawing on the surface of the control. 有关在控件上绘制的详细信息，请参阅[呈现 Windows 窗体控件](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-a-windows-forms-control)。For more information about drawing on controls, see [Rendering a Windows Forms Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-a-windows-forms-control). ## Examples 下面的代码示例为窗体启用自动滚动、调整窗体的大小，并确保在调整窗体的大小时，按钮保持可见。The following code example enables auto-scrolling for a form, resizes the form, and ensures that a button remains visible after the form is resized. 此示例要求具有 ，其中包含名为 `button2` 的 。This example requires that you have a with a named `button2` on it. value.span: ，表示控件的工作区的维数。

span.span: A that represents the dimensions of the client area of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件的工作区是控件的边界，而非工作区元素（如滚动条、边框、标题栏和菜单）的边界。The client area of a control is the bounds of the control, minus the nonclient elements such as scroll bars, borders, title bars, and menus. 调用 方法来设置 属性。The method is called to set the property. 属性并不始终通过其 `set` 方法进行更改，因此您应该重写 方法，以确保在设置 属性时执行您的代码。The property is not always changed through its `set` method so you should override the method to ensure that your code is executed when the property is set. 和 属性表示控件的工作区的宽度和高度。The and properties represent the width and height of the client area of the control. 您可以使用此属性获取控件的工作区的大小（如在控件的图面上绘制）。You can use this property to obtain the size of the client area of the control for tasks such as drawing on the surface of the control. 有关在控件上绘制的详细信息，请参阅[呈现 Windows 窗体控件](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-a-windows-forms-control)。For more information about drawing on controls, see [Rendering a Windows Forms Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-a-windows-forms-control). > [!NOTE] > 不能将应用程序设置绑定到此属性。You cannot bind application settings to this property. 有关应用程序设置的详细信息，请参阅[应用程序设置概述](/dotnet/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-overview)。For more information on application settings, see [Application Settings Overview](/dotnet/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-overview). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将调整指定控件的大小，以便控件容纳其格式化文本。The following code example resizes the specified control so the control will accommodate its formatted text. 带格式的文本是应用于文本的控件的分配 的 属性。The formatted text is the property with the control's assigned applied to the text. 本示例中的 `AutoSizeControl` 方法还具有一个 `textPadding` 参数，该参数表示要应用于控件的所有边缘的边距。The `AutoSizeControl` method in this example also has a `textPadding` parameter that represents the padding to apply to all edges of the control. 若要使填充看起来相等，请将文本与 值对齐（如果控件支持）。To make the padding appear equal, align the text with the value, if your control supports it. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以充当控件集合的父级。A can act as a parent to a collection of controls. 例如，将多个控件添加到 时，每个控件都是分配给窗体 属性的 的成员，该属性派生自 类。For example, when several controls are added to a , each of the controls is a member of the assigned to the property of the form, which is derived from the class. 您可以使用 类中提供的方法来操作分配给 属性的 中的控件。You can manipulate the controls in the assigned to the property by using the methods available in the class. 向父控件添加几个控件时，建议您在初始化要添加的控件之前调用 方法。When adding several controls to a parent control, it is recommended that you call the method before initializing the controls to be added. 向父控件添加控件后，调用 方法。After adding the controls to the parent control, call the method. 这样做将提高具有许多控件的应用程序的性能。Doing so will increase the performance of applications with many controls. 使用 属性可循环访问窗体的所有控件，包括嵌套控件。Use the property to iterate through all controls of a form, including nested controls. 使用 方法按 tab 键顺序检索上一个或下一个子控件。Use the method to retrieve the previous or next child control in the tab order. 使用 属性可获取或设置容器控件的活动控件。Use the property to get or set the active control of a container control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例从派生类的 中移除 如果它是集合的成员。The following code example removes a from the of the derived class if it is a member of the collection. 该示例要求您已在 上创建了一个 、一个 和至少一个 控件。The example requires that you have created a , a , and at least one control on a . 控件添加到 控件，并将 控件添加到 中。The control(s) are added to the control, and the control added to the . 单击该按钮时，将从 中删除名为 `removeButton` 的单选按钮。When the button is clicked, the radio button named `removeButton` is removed from the . [!code-cpp[ControlCollection#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/CPP/controlcollection.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[ControlCollection#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/CS/controlcollection.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ControlCollection#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/VB/controlcollection.vb#4)]

summary.span: 创建控件的新可访问性对象。

span.span: Creates a new accessibility object for the control.

returns.span: 控件的新 。

span.span: A new for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不显式调用 方法，则在引用 属性时将会调用此方法。If you do not explicitly call the method, it will be called when the property is referenced. > [!NOTE] > 若要获取或设置 属性，必须添加对安装了 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]的 `Accessibility` 程序集的引用。To get or set the property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 和 类创建可访问感知的图表控件，以公开辅助性信息。The following code example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控件将两条曲线与图例一起绘制。The control plots two curves along with a legend. 从 `ControlAccessibleObject`派生的 `ChartControlAccessibleObject` 类在 方法中用于为图表控件提供自定义的可访问信息。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 由于图表图例不是实际的基于 的控件，而是由图表控件绘制，因此它不具有任何内置的可访问信息。Since the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not any built-in accessible information. 因此，`ChartControlAccessibleObject` 类会重写 方法，以返回表示图例的每个部分的可访问信息的 `CurveLegendAccessibleObject`。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 当可访问感知的应用程序使用此控件时，控件可以提供必需的可访问信息。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此代码摘录演示了如何重写 方法。This code excerpt demonstrates overriding the method. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅 类概述。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CPP/chartcontrol.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CS/chartcontrol.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/VB/chartcontrol.vb#2)]

summary.span: 强制创建可见控件，包括创建句柄和任何可见子控件。

span.span: Forces the creation of the visible control, including the creation of the handle and any visible child controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法强制为控件及其子控件创建句柄。The method forces a handle to be created for the control and its child controls. 如果需要立即处理控件或其子级的句柄，则使用此方法;只调用控件的构造函数不会创建 。This method is used when you need a handle immediately for manipulation of the control or its children; simply calling a control's constructor does not create the . 如果控件的 属性 `false`， 不会创建控制句柄。 does not create a control handle if the control's property is `false`. 可以调用 方法或访问 属性，以创建控件的句柄，而不考虑控件的可见性，但在这种情况下，不会为控件的子级创建窗口句柄。You can either call the method or access the property to create the control's handle regardless of the control's visibility, but in this case, no window handles are created for the control's children.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在处理当前 Windows 消息后，通常不会保留通过 方法检索的 对象，因为使用该对象绘制的任何内容都将被下一个 WM_PAINT 消息清除。The object that you retrieve through the method should not normally be retained after the current Windows message has been processed, because anything painted with that object will be erased with the next WM_PAINT message. 因此，不能缓存 对象以供重用，除非使用 等非视觉对象方法。Therefore you cannot cache the object for reuse, except to use non-visual methods like . 相反，你必须在每次要使用 对象时调用 ，然后在使用完该对象时调用 。Instead, you must call every time that you want to use the object, and then call when you are finished using it. 有关 Windows 消息的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about Windows messages, see . 按照设计， 将所有权设置给调用线程，如果在其他线程上调用，则会失败。By design, sets ownership to the calling thread, and fails if it is called on other threads. > [!NOTE] > 除了 属性，控件上有四种线程安全方法： 、、和 （如果已创建控件的句柄）。In addition to the property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: , , , and if the handle for the control has already been created. 在后台线程上创建控件句柄之前调用 可能导致非法的跨线程调用。Calling before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls. 对于所有其他方法调用，应使用调用方法之一封送对控件线程的调用。For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将调整指定控件的大小，以便控件容纳其格式化文本。The following code example resizes the specified control so the control will accommodate its formatted text. 带格式的文本是应用于文本的控件的分配 的 属性。The formatted text is the property with the control's assigned applied to the text. 本示例中的 `AutoSizeControl` 方法还具有一个 `textPadding` 参数，该参数表示要应用于控件的所有边缘的边距。The `AutoSizeControl` method in this example also has a `textPadding` parameter that represents the padding to apply to all edges of the control. 若要使填充看起来相等，请将文本与 的 `MiddleCenter` 值对齐（如果控件支持）。To make the padding appear equal, align the text with the `MiddleCenter` value of if your control supports it. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Member5#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Member5/CPP/controlmembers5.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Member5#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Member5/CS/controlmembers5.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Member5#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Member5/VB/controlmembers5.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 分配给控件的 属性，以更改当鼠标指针位于控件上时显示的光标。Assign a to the property of the control to change the cursor displayed when the mouse pointer is over the control. 若要为应用程序上的所有控件暂时更改鼠标光标，请设置 属性。To temporarily change the mouse cursor for all controls on your application set the property. 通常，会在填充 或保存或加载文件时将 属性设置为等待光标。Typically you would set the property to a wait cursor when populating a or saving or loading a file. 属性是环境属性。The property is an ambient property. 环境属性是一个控件属性，如果未设置，则将从父控件中检索该属性。An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control. 例如，默认情况下， 将具有与其父 相同的 。For example, a will have the same as its parent by default. 有关环境属性的详细信息，请参阅 类或 类概述。For more information about ambient properties, see the class or the class overview. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用用户的可用逻辑驱动器填充 。The following code example fills a with the user's available logical drives. 该示例还设置组合框的 属性，因此当鼠标指针位于下拉按钮上时，将显示 光标。The example also sets the combo box's property so the cursor is displayed when the mouse pointer is over the drop-down button. 此代码要求 上有一个 。This code requires that you have a with a on it. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果通过编程修改或用户交互更改了 属性，则会引发此事件。This event is raised if the property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性、 类和 类更改鼠标光标。The following code example demonstrates changing the mouse cursor using the property, the class, and the class. 该示例创建一个窗体，该窗体包含一个 控件、一个 控件和一个 控件。The example creates a form that contains a control, a control, and a control. 包含 类提供的所有游标。The contains all cursors provided by the class. 当用户在 中选择鼠标光标时， 属性将设置为所选的光标，这会更新 的光标。When the user selects a mouse cursor in the , the property is set to the selected cursor, which updates the cursor for the . 每次发生 事件时更新 。The is updated every time the event occurs. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由 public `Dispose()` 方法和 方法调用。`Dispose()`This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method.`Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true`。invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用 `disposing` 设置为 `false`的 `Dispose`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

summary.span: 获取或设置哪些控件边框停靠到其父控件并确定控件如何随其父级一起调整大小。

span.span: Gets or sets which control borders are docked to its parent control and determines how a control is resized with its parent.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可定义控件在其父控件调整大小时自动调整大小的方式。Use the property to define how a control is automatically resized as its parent control is resized. 例如，将 设置为 会导致控件与其父控件的左边缘对齐，并在父控件调整大小时进行重设大小。For example, setting to causes the control to align itself with the left edges of its parent control and to resize as the parent control is resized. 控件按其 Z 顺序停靠，这是窗体上的控件沿窗体的 Z 轴（深度）的可视化分层。Controls are docked in their Z-order, which is the visual layering of controls on a form along the form's Z-axis (depth). 控件可以停靠到其父容器的一个边缘，也可以停靠到所有边缘并填充父容器。A control can be docked to one edge of its parent container or can be docked to all edges and fill the parent container. 设置停靠控件上的 "" 属性对控件距其容器边缘的距离不起作用。Setting the property on a docked control has no effect on the distance of the control from the edges of its container. > [!NOTE] > 和 属性互相排斥。The and properties are mutually exclusive. 一次只能设置一个，而最后一个集则优先。Only one can be set at a time, and the last one set takes precedence. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建 ，并设置其一些公共属性。The following code example creates a and sets some of its common properties. 该示例创建一个 并在 "分组" 框中设置其 。The example creates a and sets its within the group box. 接下来，它设置分组框的 属性，并将该组框停靠到窗体的顶部。Next, it sets the property of the group box, and docks the group box to the top of the form. 最后，它通过将 属性设置为 `false`来禁用分组框，这将导致禁用组框中包含的所有控件。Lastly, it disables the group box by setting the property to `false`, which causes all controls contained within the group box to be disabled. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CPP/controlproperties.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CS/controlproperties.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/VB/controlproperties.vb#2)]

public: System::Windows::Forms::DragDropEffects DoDragDrop(System::Object ^ data, System::Windows::Forms::DragDropEffects allowedEffects);

span.span: The data to drag.
One of the values.

summary.span: 开始拖放操作。

span.span: Begins a drag-and-drop operation.

returns.span: 枚举的值，它表示在拖放操作期间执行的最终效果。

span.span: A value from the enumeration that represents the final effect that was performed during the drag-and-drop operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `allowedEffects` 参数确定可发生的拖动操作。The `allowedEffects` parameter determines which drag operations can occur. 如果拖动操作需要与另一进程中的应用程序进行互操作，则数据应为基托管类（、或 ）或实现 或 的对象。If the drag operation needs to interoperate with applications in another process, data should either be a base managed class (, , or ), or an object that implements or . 下面描述与拖放操作相关的事件的引发方式以及引发时间。The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised. 方法确定当前光标位置下的控件。The method determines the control under the current cursor location. 然后，它会检查控件是否为有效的拖放目标。It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target. 如果控件是有效的拖放目标，则会随指定的拖放效果引发 事件。If the control is a valid drop target, the event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified. 有关拖放效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the enumeration. 跟踪鼠标光标位置、键盘状态和鼠标按钮状态的更改。Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked. - 如果用户移出一个窗口，则引发 事件。If the user moves out of a window, the event is raised. - 如果鼠标进入另一个控件，则引发该控件的 。If the mouse enters another control, the for that control is raised. - 如果鼠标移动但停留在同一个控件中，则引发 事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the event is raised. 如果键盘或鼠标按钮状态发生了更改，则会引发 事件，并确定是继续拖动、删除数据还是根据事件的 的 属性的值来取消操作。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the property of the event's . - 如果 `Continue` 的值，则将引发 事件以继续操作，并将以新效果引发 事件，以便可以设置适当的视觉反馈。If the value of is `Continue`, the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 有关有效放置效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 和 事件是成对的，因此当鼠标移动到放置目标上时，将为用户提供有关鼠标位置的最新反馈。The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position. - 如果 `Drop` 的值，则将删除效果值返回到源，以便源应用程序可以对源数据执行适当的操作;例如，如果是移动操作，则剪切数据。If the value of is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. - 如果 `Cancel` 的值，则会引发 事件。If the value of is `Cancel`, the event is raised. > [!NOTE] > 方法将捕获所有异常，并仅重新引发以下安全或严重异常：The method catches all exceptions and rethrows only the following security or critical exceptions: - SecurityExceptionSecurityException - NullReferenceExceptionNullReferenceException - StackOverflowExceptionStackOverflowException - OutOfMemoryExceptionOutOfMemoryException - ThreadAbortExceptionThreadAbortException - ExecutionEngineExceptionExecutionEngineException - IndexOutOfRangeExceptionIndexOutOfRangeException - AccessViolationExceptionAccessViolationException ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示两个 控件之间的拖放操作。The following code example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 该示例在拖动操作开始时调用 方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果鼠标在 事件期间从鼠标位置移动了超出 ，则拖动操作将启动。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用于确定 `MouseDown` 事件期间要拖动的项的索引。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 该示例还演示了如何对拖放操作使用自定义光标。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 该示例要求在应用程序目录中分别有两个 cursor 文件 `3dwarro.cur` 和 `3dwno.cur`，分别用于自定义的拖放和无删除光标。The example requires that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果选中 `UseCustomCursorsCheck` ，则将使用自定义光标。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自定义游标是在 事件处理程序中设置的。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 键盘状态在右侧 `ListBox`的 事件处理程序中进行计算，以确定拖动操作将基于 SHIFT、CTRL、ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 键的状态。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based on state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 在 `DragOver` 事件期间，也确定了放置的 `ListBox` 位置。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要删除的数据不是 `String`，则将 设置为 中的 `None`。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to `None` in . 最后，drop 的状态显示在 `DropLocationLabel` 中。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel` . 向右 `ListBox` 放置的数据是在 事件处理程序中确定的，`String` 值将添加到 `ListBox`中的适当位置。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果拖动操作移到窗体的边界之外，则会在 事件处理程序中取消拖放操作。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 枚举来指定如何在拖放操作涉及的控件之间传输数据。The following code example shows how to use the enumeration to specify how data should be transferred between the controls involved in a drag-and-drop operation. 此示例要求窗体包含 控件和 控件，并使用有效文件名的列表填充 控件。This example requires that your form includes a control and a control and that the control is populated with a list of valid file names. 当用户将文件名拖动到 控件上时，将引发该控件的 事件。When the user drags a file name onto the control, the control's event is raised. 在事件处理程序中， 的 属性初始化为 ，以指示应将文件路径引用的数据复制到 控件。Within the event handler, the property of the is initialized to to indicate that the data referenced by the file path should be copied to the control. [!code-cpp[RichTextDragDrop#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RichTextDragDrop#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RichTextDragDrop#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此控件是否应使用辅助缓冲区重绘其图面，以减少或避免闪烁。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this control should redraw its surface using a secondary buffer to reduce or prevent flicker.

value.span: 如果应使用双缓冲绘制控件的图面，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the surface of the control should be drawn using double buffering; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缓冲图形可减少或消除因渐进式重绘显示的图面部分而引起的闪烁。Buffered graphics can reduce or eliminate flicker that is caused by progressive redrawing of parts of a displayed surface. 缓冲图形要求首先将更新后的图形数据写入缓冲区。Buffered graphics require that the updated graphics data is first written to a buffer. 然后，图形缓冲区中的数据将快速写入显示的图面内存。The data in the graphics buffer is then quickly written to displayed surface memory. 显示的图形内存相对快速的切换通常会减少可能出现的闪烁。The relatively quick switch of the displayed graphics memory typically reduces the flicker that can otherwise occur. > [!NOTE] > 不是可绑定的属性。 is not a bindable property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DoubleClick As EventHandler

summary.span: 在双击控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control is double-clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 双击由用户操作系统的鼠标设置确定。A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system. 用户可以设置两次单击鼠标按钮之间的时间以便将这两次单击认为是双击而不是两次单击。The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click rather than two clicks. 每次双击控件时都会引发 事件。The event is raised every time a control is double-clicked. 例如，如果您具有 的 和 事件的事件处理程序，则在双击窗体并调用这两个方法时，将引发 和 事件。For example, if you have event handlers for the and events of a , the and events are raised when the form is double-clicked and both methods are called. 如果双击控件，而该控件不支持 事件，则 事件可能会引发两次。If a control is double-clicked and that control does not support the event, the event might be raised twice. 必须将 的 `StandardDoubleClick` 和 `StandardClick` 值设置为 "`true`"，才能引发此事件。You must set the `StandardDoubleClick` and `StandardClick` values of to `true` for this event to be raised. 如果要从现有 Windows 窗体控件继承，则这些值可能已设置为 `true`。These values might already be set to `true` if you are inheriting from existing Windows Forms controls. > [!NOTE] > 除非 集合中至少有一个 ，否则不会为 类引发以下事件： 、、、、、、 和 。The following events are not raised for the class unless there is at least one in the collection: , , , , , , and . 如果集合中至少有一个 ，并且用户与选项卡控件的标头（显示 名称）交互， 将引发相应的事件。If there is at least one in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the names appear), the raises the appropriate event. 但是，如果用户交互位于选项卡页的工作区中，则 引发相应的事件。However, if the user interaction is within the client area of the tab page, the raises the appropriate event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 的 事件将 中列出的文本文件加载到 控件中。The following code example uses the event of a to load text files listed in the into a control. [!code-cpp[Control.DoubleClick#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.DoubleClick/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.DoubleClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.DoubleClick/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.DoubleClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.DoubleClick/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DragDrop As DragEventHandler

summary.span: 拖放操作完成时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a drag-and-drop operation is completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的 和 属性采用屏幕坐标，而不是客户端坐标。The and properties of the are in screen coordinates, not client coordinates. 下面的 Visual C#代码行将属性转换为客户端 。The following line of Visual C# code converts the properties to a client . ``` Point clientPoint = targetControl.PointToClient(new Point(de.X, de.Y)); ``` > [!NOTE] > 在早于 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]的版本中，如果在 Windows 窗体上放置了 和 事件的 ，并在设计时将某些内容拖放到 ，则会引发 `DropDrop` 和 `DropEnter` 事件。In versions earlier than [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], if you put a with and events on a Windows Form and drag and drop something onto the at design time, the `DropDrop` and `DropEnter` events are raised. 但是，在关闭并重新打开解决方案时，不会再次引发 和 事件。However, when you close and reopen the solution, the and events are not raised again. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 此代码摘录演示了如何使用 事件。This code excerpt demonstrates using the event. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅 方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DragEnter As DragEventHandler

summary.span: 在将对象拖入控件的边界时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an object is dragged into the control's bounds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在拖放操作过程中，当用户首次将鼠标光标拖动到控件上时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when the user first drags the mouse cursor over the control during a drag-and-drop operation. > [!NOTE] > 在早于 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]的版本中，如果在 Windows 窗体上放置了 和 事件的 ，并在设计时将某些内容拖放到 ，则会引发 `DropDrop` 和 `DropEnter` 事件。In versions earlier than [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], if you put a with and events on a Windows Form and drag and drop something onto the at design time, the `DropDrop` and `DropEnter` events are raised. 但是，在关闭并重新打开解决方案时，不会再次引发 和 事件。However, when you close and reopen the solution, the and events are not raised again. 下面描述与拖放操作相关的事件的引发方式以及引发时间。The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised. 方法确定当前光标位置下的控件。The method determines the control under the current cursor location. 然后，它会检查控件是否为有效的拖放目标。It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target. 如果控件是有效的拖放目标，则会随指定的拖放效果引发 事件。If the control is a valid drop target, the event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified. 有关拖放效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the enumeration. 跟踪鼠标光标位置、键盘状态和鼠标按钮状态的更改。Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked. - 如果用户移出一个窗口，则引发 事件。If the user moves out of a window, the event is raised. - 如果鼠标进入另一个控件，则引发该控件的 。If the mouse enters another control, the for that control is raised. - 如果鼠标移动但停留在同一个控件中，则引发 事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the event is raised. 如果键盘或鼠标按钮状态发生了更改，则会引发 事件，并确定是继续拖动、删除数据还是根据事件的 的 属性的值来取消操作。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the property of the event's . - 如果 `Continue` 的值，则将引发 事件以继续操作，并将以新效果引发 事件，以便可以设置适当的视觉反馈。If the value of is `Continue`, the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 有关有效放置效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 和 事件是成对的，因此当鼠标移动到放置目标上时，将为用户提供有关鼠标位置的最新反馈。The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position. - 如果 `Drop` 的值，则将删除效果值返回到源，以便源应用程序可以对源数据执行适当的操作;例如，如果是移动操作，则剪切数据。If the value of is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. - 如果 `Cancel` 的值，则会引发 事件。If the value of is `Cancel`, the event is raised. > [!NOTE] > 的 和 属性采用屏幕坐标，而不是客户端坐标。The and properties of the are in screen coordinates, not client coordinates. 下面的 Visual C#代码行将属性转换为客户端 。The following line of Visual C# code converts the properties to a client . ``` Point clientPoint = targetControl.PointToClient(new Point(de.X, de.Y)); ``` 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示两个 控件之间的拖放操作。The following code example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 该示例在拖动操作开始时调用 方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果鼠标在 事件期间从鼠标位置移动了超出 ，则拖动操作将启动。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用于确定 `MouseDown` 事件期间要拖动的项的索引。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 该示例还演示了如何对拖放操作使用自定义光标。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 该示例要求在应用程序目录中分别有两个 cursor 文件 `3dwarro.cur` 和 `3dwno.cur`，分别用于自定义的拖放和无删除光标。The example requires that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果选中 `UseCustomCursorsCheck`，则将使用自定义光标。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自定义游标是在 事件处理程序中设置的。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 键盘状态在右侧 `ListBox`的 事件处理程序中进行计算，以确定拖动操作将基于 SHIFT、CTRL、ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 键的状态。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based on state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 在 `DragOver` 事件期间，也确定了放置的 `ListBox` 位置。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要删除的数据不是 `String`，则将 设置为 中的 `None`。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to `None` in . 最后，drop 的状态显示在 `DropLocationLabel`中。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 向右 `ListBox` 放置的数据是在 事件处理程序中确定的，`String` 值将添加到 `ListBox`中的适当位置。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果拖动操作移到窗体的边界之外，则会在 事件处理程序中取消拖放操作。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此代码摘录演示了如何使用 事件。This code excerpt demonstrates using the event. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅 方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户将光标拖出控件或用户取消当前拖放操作时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when the user drags the cursor out of the control or the user cancels the current drag-and-drop operation. 下面描述与拖放操作相关的事件的引发方式以及引发时间。The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised. 方法确定当前光标位置下的控件。The method determines the control under the current cursor drag-and-drop effect specified. 有关拖放效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the enumeration. 跟踪鼠标光标位置、键盘状态和鼠标按钮状态的更改。Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked. - 如果用户移出一个窗口，则引发 事件。If the user moves out of a window, the event is raised. - 如果鼠标进入另一个控件，则引发该控件的 。If the mouse enters another control, the for that control is raised. - 如果鼠标移动但停留在同一个控件中，则引发 事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the event is raised. 如果键盘或鼠标按钮状态发生了更改，则会引发 事件，并确定是继续拖动、删除数据还是根据事件的 的 属性的值来取消操作。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the property of the event's . - 如果 `Continue` 的值，则将引发 事件以继续操作，并将以新效果引发 事件，以便可以设置适当的视觉反馈。If the value of is `Continue`, the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 有关有效放置效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 和 事件是成对的，因此当鼠标移动到放置目标上时，将为用户提供有关鼠标位置的最新反馈。The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position. - 如果 `Drop` 的值，则将删除效果值返回到源，以便源应用程序可以对源数据执行适当的操作;例如，如果是移动操作，则剪切数据。If the value of is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. - 如果 `Cancel` 的值，则会引发 事件。If the value of is `Cancel`, the event is raised. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示两个 控件之间的拖放操作。The following code example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 该示例在拖动操作开始时调用 方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果鼠标在 事件期间从鼠标位置移动了超出 ，则拖动操作将启动。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用于确定 `MouseDown` 事件期间要拖动的项的索引。The method is used to determine the `3dwarro.cur` 和 `3dwno.cur`，分别用于自定义的拖放和无删除光标。The example requires that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果选中 `UseCustomCursorsCheck`，则将使用自定义光标。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自定义游标是在 事件处理程序中设置的。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 键盘状态在右侧 `ListBox`的 事件处理程序中进行计算，以确定拖动操作将基于 SHIFT、CTRL、ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 键的状态。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be event. 如果要删除的数据不是 `String`，则将 设置为 中的 `None`。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to `None` in . 最后，drop 的状态显示在 `DropLocationLabel`中。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 向右 `ListBox` 放置的数据是在 事件处理程序中确定的，`String` 值将添加到 `ListBox`中的适当位置。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果拖动操作移到窗体的边界之外，则会在 事件处理程序中取消拖放操作。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此代码摘录演示了如何使用 事件。This code excerpt demonstrates using the event. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅 方法。See the method for the complete code example. summary.span: 在将对象拖到控件的边界上发生。

span.span: Occurs when an object is dragged over the control's bounds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当鼠标光标在拖放操作期间在控件的边界内移动时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when the mouse cursor moves within the bounds of the control during a drag-and-drop operation. 下面描述与拖放操作相关的事件的引发方式以及引发时间。The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised. 方法确定当前光标位置下的控件。The method determines the control under the current cursor location. 然后，它会检查控件是否为有效的拖放目标。It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target. 如果控件是有效的拖放目标，则会随指定的拖放效果引发 事件。If the control is a valid drop target, the event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified. 有关拖放效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the enumeration. 跟踪鼠标光标位置、键盘状态和鼠标按钮状态的更改。Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked. - 如果用户移出一个窗口，则引发 事件。If the user moves out of a window, the event is raised. - 如果鼠标进入另一个控件，则引发该控件的 。If the mouse enters another control, the for that control is raised. - 如果鼠标移动但停留在同一个控件中，则引发 事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the event is raised. 如果键盘或鼠标按钮状态发生了更改，则会引发 事件，并确定是继续拖动、删除数据还是根据事件的 的 属性的值来取消操作。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the property of the event's . - 如果 `Continue` 值的值，则将引发 事件以继续操作，并将以新效果引发 事件，以便可以设置适当的视觉反馈。If the value of value is `Continue`, the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 有关有效放置效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 和 事件是成对的，因此当鼠标移动到放置目标上时，将为用户提供有关鼠标位置的最新反馈。The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position. - 如果 `Drop` 的值，则将删除效果值返回到源，以便源应用程序可以对源数据执行适当的操作;例如，如果是移动操作，则剪切数据。If the value of is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. - 如果 `Cancel` 的值，则会引发 事件。If the value of is `Cancel`, the event is raised. > [!NOTE] > 的 和 属性采用屏幕坐标，而不是客户端坐标。The and properties of the are in screen coordinates, not client coordinates. 以下C#代码行将属性转换为客户端 ：The following line of C# code converts the properties to a client : > > Point clientPoint = targetControl.PointToClient(new Point(de.X, de.Y));Point clientPoint = targetControl.PointToClient(new Point(de.X, de.Y)); 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示两个 控件之间的拖放操作。The following code example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 该示例在拖动操作开始时调用 方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果鼠标在 事件期间从鼠标位置移动了超出 ，则拖动操作将启动。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用于确定 `MouseDown` 事件期间要拖动的项的索引。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 该示例还演示了如何对拖放操作使用自定义光标。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 该示例要求在应用程序目录中分别有两个 cursor 文件 `3dwarro.cur` 和 `3dwno.cur`，分别用于自定义的拖放和无删除光标。The example requires that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果选中 `UseCustomCursorsCheck`，则将使用自定义光标。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自定义游标是在 事件处理程序中设置的。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 键盘状态在右侧 `ListBox`的 事件处理程序中进行计算，以确定拖动操作将基于 SHIFT、CTRL、ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 键的状态。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based on state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 在 `DragOver` 事件期间，也确定了放置的 `ListBox` 位置。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要删除的数据不是 `String`，则将 设置为 中的 `None`。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to `None` in . 最后，drop 的状态显示在 `DropLocationLabel`中。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 向右 `ListBox` 放置的数据是在 事件处理程序中确定的，`String` 值将添加到 `ListBox`中的适当位置。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果拖动操作移到窗体的边界之外，则会在 事件处理程序中取消拖放操作。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此代码摘录演示了如何使用 事件。This code excerpt demonstrates using the event. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅 方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性，您可以在运行时启用或禁用控件。With the property, you can enable or disable controls at run time. 例如，可以禁用不适用于应用程序当前状态的控件。For example, you can disable controls that do not apply to the current state of the application. 您还可以禁用控件以限制其使用。You can also disable a control to restrict its use. 例如，可以禁用某个按钮以阻止用户单击该按钮。For example, a button can be disabled to prevent the user from clicking it. 如果控件被禁用，则无法选择它。If a control is disabled, it cannot be selected. > [!IMPORTANT] > 将 属性设置为 "`false` 不会禁用应用程序的控制框，也不会阻止应用程序窗口接收焦点。Setting the property to `false` does not disable the application's control box or prevent the application window from receiving the focus. 如果容器控件的 enabled 属性设置为 "`false`"，则将同时禁用其包含的所有控件。When a container control has its enabled property set to `false`, all its contained controls are disabled, as well. 例如，如果用户单击已禁用 控件中包含的任何控件，则不会引发任何事件。For example, if the user clicks on any of the controls contained in a disabled control, no events are raised. > [!NOTE] > 禁用可滚动的控件时，也会禁用滚动条。When a scrollable control is disabled, the scroll bars are also disabled. 例如，禁用的多行文本框无法滚动显示所有文本行。For example, a disabled multiline textbox is unable to scroll to display all the lines of text. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建 ，并设置其一些公共属性。The following code example creates a and sets some of its common properties. 该示例创建一个 并在 "分组" 框中设置其 。The example creates a and sets its within the group box. 接下来，它设置分组框的 属性，并将该组框停靠到窗体的顶部。Next, it sets the property of the group box, and docks the group box to the top of the form. 最后，它通过将 属性设置为 `false`来禁用分组框，这将导致禁用组框中包含的所有控件。Lastly, it disables the group box by setting the property to `false`, which causes all controls contained within the group box to be disabled. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CPP/controlproperties.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CS/controlproperties.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/VB/controlproperties.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果异步操作尚未完成，则此函数将被阻止，直到结果可用。If the asynchronous operation has not been completed, this function will block until the result is available. > [!NOTE] > 除了 属性，控件上有四种线程安全方法： 、、和 （如果已创建控件的句柄）。In addition to the property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: , , , and if the handle for the control has already been created. 在后台线程上创建控件句柄之前调用 可能导致非法的跨线程调用。Calling before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls. 对于所有其他方法调用，应使用调用方法之一封送对控件线程的调用。For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用键盘（TAB、SHIFT + TAB 等）更改焦点时，通过调用 或 方法，或者通过将 属性设置为当前窗体，焦点事件会按以下顺序发生：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the or methods, or by setting the property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 使用鼠标或通过调用 方法更改焦点时，焦点事件将按以下顺序发生：When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the method, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 如果 属性设置为 `false`，则将取消 和 事件。If the property is set to `false`, the and events are suppressed. > [!NOTE] > 类抑制 和 事件。The and events are suppressed by the class. 类中的等效事件是 和 事件。The equivalent events in the class are the and events. 和 事件具有层次结构，并将在父链上向上和向下，直到达到适当的控件。The and events are hierarchical and will cascade up and down the parent chain until the appropriate control is reached. 例如，假设有一个具有两个 控件的 ，并且每个 控件都有一个 控件。For example, assume you have a with two controls, and each control has one control. 当插入符号从一个 移动到另一个时，将为 和 引发 事件，并为另一个 和 引发 事件。When the caret is moved from one to the other, the event is raised for the and , and the event is raised for the other and . > [!CAUTION] > 不要尝试从 、、、、或 事件处理程序中设置焦点。Do not attempt to set focus from within the , , , , , or event handlers. 这样做可能会导致您的应用程序或操作系统停止响应。Doing so can cause your application or the operating system to stop responding. 有关详细信息，请参阅 "[关于消息和消息队列](/windows/win32/winmsg/about-messages-and-message-queues)" 主题的 "键盘输入参考" 部分中的 `WM_KILLFOCUS` 主题和 "消息死锁" 部分。For more information, see the `WM_KILLFOCUS` topic in the "Keyboard Input Reference" section and the "Message Deadlocks" section of the [About Messages and Message Queues](/windows/win32/winmsg/about-messages-and-message-queues) topic. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 事件来更改特定情况下 的前景色和背景色。The following code example uses the event to change the foreground and background colors of a under particular conditions. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件成功接收了输入焦点，则 方法返回 `true`。The method returns `true` if the control successfully received input focus. 控件可以具有输入焦点，而不显示有焦点的任何可视提示。The control can have the input focus while not displaying any visual cues of having the focus. 此行为主要由下面列出的不可选控件或从其派生的任何控件来观察。This behavior is primarily observed by the nonselectable controls listed below, or any controls derived from them. 如果满足以下所有条件，则可以选择一个控件并接收输入焦点： 的 `Selectable` 值设置为 `true`，它包含在另一个控件中，并且其所有父控件都可见且已启用。A control can be selected and receive input focus if all the following are true: the `Selectable` value of is set to `true`, it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled. 以下列表中的 Windows 窗体控件不可选择。The Windows Forms controls in the following list are not selectable. 从这些控件派生的控件也不是可选的。Controls derived from these controls are also not selectable. - - - - - - - （当控件中不存在链接时） (when there is no link present in the control) > [!NOTE] > 是主要为自定义控件作者设计的低级别方法。 is a low-level method intended primarily for custom control authors. 相反，应用程序程序员应使用子控件的 方法或 属性，或使用窗体的 方法。Instead, application programmers should use the method or the property for child controls, or the method for forms. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将焦点设置到指定的 （如果它可以接收焦点）。The following code example sets focus to the specified , if it can receive focus.
