MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event GiveFeedback As GiveFeedbackEventHandler

summary.span: 在执行拖动操作期间发生。

span.span: Occurs during a drag operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当启动拖放操作时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when a drag-and-drop operation is started. 使用 事件，拖动事件源可以修改鼠标指针的外观，以便在拖放操作过程中为用户提供视觉反馈。With the event, the source of a drag event can modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation. 下面描述与拖放操作相关的事件的引发方式以及引发时间。The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised. 方法确定当前光标位置下的控件。The method determines the control under the current cursor location. 然后，它会检查控件是否为有效的拖放目标。It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target. 如果控件是有效的拖放目标，则会随指定的拖放效果引发 事件。If the control is a valid drop target, the event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified. 有关拖放效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the enumeration. 跟踪鼠标光标位置、键盘状态和鼠标按钮状态的更改。Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked. - 如果用户移出一个窗口，则引发 事件。If the user moves out of a window, the event is raised. - 如果鼠标进入另一个控件，则引发该控件的 。If the mouse enters another control, the for that control is raised. - 如果鼠标移动但停留在同一个控件中，则引发 事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the event is raised. 如果键盘或鼠标按钮状态发生了更改，则会引发 事件，并确定是继续拖动、删除数据还是根据事件的 的 属性的值来取消操作。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the property of the event's . - 如果 `Continue` 的值，则将引发 事件以继续操作，并将以新效果引发 事件，以便可以设置适当的视觉反馈。If the value of is `Continue`, the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 有关有效放置效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 和 事件是成对的，因此当鼠标移动到放置目标上时，将为用户提供有关鼠标位置的最新反馈。The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position. - 如果 `Drop` 的值，则将删除效果值返回到源，以便源应用程序可以对源数据执行适当的操作;例如，如果是移动操作，则剪切数据。If the value of is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. - 如果 `Cancel` 的值，则会引发 事件。If the value of is `Cancel`, the event is raised. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示两个 控件之间的拖放操作。The following code example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 该示例在拖动操作开始时调用 方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果鼠标在 事件期间从鼠标位置移动了超出 ，则拖动操作将启动。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用于确定 `MouseDown` 事件期间要拖动的项的索引。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 该示例还演示了如何对拖放操作使用自定义光标。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 该示例要求在应用程序目录中分别有两个 cursor 文件 `3dwarro.cur` 和 `3dwno.cur`，分别用于自定义的拖放和无删除光标。The example requires that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果选中 `UseCustomCursorsCheck`，则将使用自定义光标。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自定义游标是在 事件处理程序中设置的。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 键盘状态在右侧 `ListBox`的 事件处理程序中进行计算，以确定拖动操作将基于 SHIFT、CTRL、ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 键的状态。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based on state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 在 `DragOver` 事件期间，也确定了放置的 `ListBox` 位置。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要删除的数据不是 `String`，则将 设置为 中的 `None`。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to `None` in . 最后，drop 的状态显示在 `DropLocationLabel`中。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 向右 `ListBox` 放置的数据是在 事件处理程序中确定的，`String` 值将添加到 `ListBox`中的适当位置。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果拖动操作移到窗体的边界之外，则会在 事件处理程序中取消拖放操作。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此代码摘录演示了如何使用 事件。This code excerpt demonstrates using the event. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅 方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 在控件接收焦点时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control receives focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用键盘（TAB、SHIFT + TAB 等）更改焦点时，通过调用 或 方法，或者通过将 属性设置为当前窗体，焦点事件会按以下顺序发生：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the or methods, or by setting the property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 使用鼠标或通过调用 方法更改焦点时，焦点事件将按以下顺序发生：When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the method, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 如果 属性设置为 `false`，则将取消 和 事件。If the property is set to `false`, the and events are suppressed. **注意** 和 事件是与 WM_KILLFOCUS 和 WM_SETFOCUS Windows 消息相关联的低级别焦点事件。**Note** The and events are low-level focus events that are tied to the WM_KILLFOCUS and WM_SETFOCUS Windows messages. 通常，仅当更新 或编写自定义控件时，才使用 和 事件。Typically, the and events are only used when updating or when writing custom controls. 相反， 和 事件应该用于除 类之外的所有控件，后者使用 和 事件。Instead the and events should be used for all controls except the class, which uses the and events. 有关 和 事件的详细信息，请参阅[WM_SETFOCUS](/windows/win32/inputdev/wm-setfocus)和[WM_KILLFOCUS](/windows/win32/inputdev/wm-killfocus)主题。For more information about the and events, see the [WM_SETFOCUS](/windows/win32/inputdev/wm-setfocus) and [WM_KILLFOCUS](/windows/win32/inputdev/wm-killfocus) topics. > [!CAUTION] > 不要尝试从 、、、、或 事件处理程序中设置焦点。Do not attempt to set focus from within the , , , , , or event handlers. 这样做可能会导致您的应用程序或操作系统停止响应。Doing so can cause your application or the operating system to stop responding. 有关详细信息，请参阅[WM_KILLFOCUS](/windows/win32/inputdev/wm-killfocus)主题。For more information, see the [WM_KILLFOCUS](/windows/win32/inputdev/wm-killfocus) topic. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到一个项目中，该项目包含继承自 的类型的实例，如 或 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后，将该实例命名为 `Control1` 并确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 集合的 大于零， 属性将返回 `true`。If the collection has a greater than zero, the property will return `true`. 如果控件没有任何子级，则访问 属性不会强制创建 ，因此在控制控件树时，引用此属性可提供性能优势。Accessing the property does not force the creation of a if the control has no children, so referencing this property can provide a performance benefit when walking a tree of controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将控件的 和 设置为默认系统颜色。The following code example sets the and of the controls to the default system colors. 如果控件有任何子控件，则代码会以递归方式调用自身。The code recursively calls itself if the control has any child controls. 此代码示例要求具有至少一个子控件的 ;但是，子容器控件（如 或 ，具有其自己的子控件）可以更好地演示递归。This code example requires that you have a with at least one child control; however, a child container control, like a or , with its own child control(s) would better demonstrate the recursion. summary.span: 用户请求控件帮助时发生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户按 F1 键或单击关联的上下文相关帮助按钮时，通常会引发 事件。The event is commonly raised when the user presses the F1 key or an associated context-sensitive help button is clicked. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理 事件，以在包含四个地址字段的窗体上显示自定义帮助内容。The following code example demonstrates handling the event to display custom Help content on a form containing four address fields. 通过在地址字段中按 F1 键，或者通过使用上下文相关帮助按钮并单击地址字段上的帮助光标，引发 事件。The event is raised either by pressing the F1 key with the focus in an address field, or by the using the context-sensitive Help button and clicking the Help cursor on an address field. 属性设置为 true，表示处理 `HelpRequested` 事件。The property is set to true to indicate that the `HelpRequested` event is handled. 该示例还演示了如何将帮助文本存储在 属性中。The example also demonstrates storing the Help text in the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks IME 是一种允许用户使用标准键盘输入复杂字符和符号（如日文汉字字符）的程序。An IME is a program that enables users to enter complex characters and symbols, such as Japanese Kanji characters, using a standard keyboard. 对于仅用于输入数值的 控件， 属性通常设置为 。The property is typically set to for a control that is intended to only enter numeric values. 类的 属性值设置为 。The property value is set to for the class. 大多数不直接支持输入法编辑器或允许输入法直接输入的类会将此属性的值设置为 。Most classes that do not directly support Input Method Editors, or allow direct input from an IME, will set the value of this property to . > [!IMPORTANT] > 用户可以通过交互方式更改 ，除非已通过编程方式将其设置为 。The user can interactively change the unless it has been programmatically set to . 在这种情况下，用户将无法使用 IME。In this case, the user will not be able to use the IME. > > 当全局输入模式生效时，Windows 8 上的 属性将被忽略。The property is ignored on Windows 8 when the global input mode is in effect. 有关详细信息，请参阅[切换文本输入从每个线程更改为每用户](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=256509)。For more info, see [Switch Text Input Changed from Per-Thread to Per-User](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=256509).

summary.span: 在 属性更改后发生。

span.span: Occurs when the property has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果通过编程修改或通过交互更改 属性，则会引发此事件。This event is raised if the property is changed by either a programmatic modification or through interaction. 不支持输入法管理器的控件永远不会引发此事件。Controls that do not support Input Method Managers will never raise this event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个事件处理程序，当 的属性值更改时，将执行该处理程序。The following code example is an event handler that is executed when the property value changes. 类具有多个具有名称模式*PropertyName*`Changed` 的方法，这些方法在相应的*PropertyName*值更改（*PropertyName*表示相应属性的名称）时引发。The class has several methods with the name pattern *PropertyName*`Changed` that are raised when the corresponding *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property). 下面的代码示例更改了显示货币数据 的 。The following code example changes the of a displaying currency data. 该示例将文本转换为十进制数字，并在数字为负数时将 更改为 ，如果数字为正，则更改为 。The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the to if the number is negative and to if the number is positive. 此示例要求具有包含 的 。This example requires that you have a that contains a . [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control_PropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_PropertyChangedEvents/CPP/propertychangedevents.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control_PropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_PropertyChangedEvents/CS/propertychangedevents.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control_PropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_PropertyChangedEvents/VB/propertychangedevents.vb#1)]

summary.span: 在将控件添加到另一个容器之后调用。

span.span: Called after the control has been added to another container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 向容器添加控件后立即调用 方法。The method is called immediately after adding a control to a container. 方法使控件可以根据其容器初始化其布局状态。The method enables a control to initialize its layout state based on its container. 例如，通常会在 方法中对控件应用锚定和停靠。For example, you would typically apply anchoring and docking to the control in the method.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写 时，请确保调用基类的 方法，以便正确显示控件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that the control is displayed correctly.

summary.span: 使控件的特定区域无效并向控件发送绘制消息。

span.span: Invalidates a specific region of the control and causes a paint message to be sent to the control.

summary.span: 使控件的整个曲面无效并导致重绘控件。

span.span: Invalidates the entire surface of the control and causes the control to be redrawn.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 方法不会强制执行同步绘制;若要强制执行同步画图，请在调用 方法后调用 方法。Calling the method does not force a synchronous paint; to force a synchronous paint, call the method after calling the method. 如果在没有参数的情况下调用此方法，则会将整个工作区添加到更新区域。When this method is called with no parameters, the entire client area is added to the update region. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用户能够将图像或图像文件拖到窗体上，并在删除它时显示它。The following code example enables the user to drag an image or image file onto the form, and have it be displayed at the point on it is dropped. 重写 方法，以便在每次绘制窗体时重绘图像;否则，只有在下一次重画时才会保留图像。The method is overridden to repaint the image each time the form is painted; otherwise the image would only persist until the next repainting. 事件处理方法确定要拖动到窗体中的数据的类型，并提供相应的反馈。The event-handling method determines the type of data being dragged into the form and provides the appropriate feedback. 如果可从数据创建 ，则 事件处理方法将显示窗体上的图像。The event-handling method displays the image on the form, if an can be created from the data. 由于 和 值是屏幕坐标，因此该示例使用 方法将它们转换为客户端坐标。Because the and values are screen coordinates, the example uses the method to convert them to client coordinates. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations/CPP/imagedrag.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations/CS/imagedrag.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations/VB/imagedrag.vb#1)]

summary.span: 控件的显示要求重新绘制时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a control's display requires redrawing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到一个项目中，该项目包含继承自 的类型的实例，如 或 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后，将该实例命名为 `Control1` 并确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#40)]

summary.span: 在拥有此控件的基础窗口句柄的线程上执行委托。

span.span: Executes a delegate on the thread that owns the control's underlying window handle.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance object Invoke(class System.Delegate method) cil managed
Public Function Invoke (method As Delegate) As Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: method
param.span: 包含要在控件的线程上下文中调用的方法的委托。

span.span: A delegate that contains a method to be called in the control's thread context.

summary.span: 在拥有控件的基础窗口句柄的线程上执行指定的委托。

span.span: Executes the specified delegate on the thread that owns the control's underlying window handle.

returns.span: 正在被调用的委托的返回值，或者如果委托没有返回值，则为 。

span.span: The return value from the delegate being invoked, or if the delegate has no return value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 委托类似于 C 或C++语言中的函数指针。Delegates are similar to function pointers in C or C++ languages. 委托封装对委托对象内的方法的引用。Delegates encapsulate a reference to a method inside a delegate object. 然后，可以将委托对象传递给调用所引用的方法的代码，在编译时要调用的方法可能是未知的。The delegate object can then be passed to code that calls the referenced method, and the method to be invoked can be unknown at compile time. 与 C 或C++中的函数指针不同，委托是面向对象的、类型安全且更安全。Unlike function pointers in C or C++, delegates are object-oriented, type-safe, and more secure. 如果当前控件的基础窗口句柄尚不存在，则 方法会在控件的父链中向上搜索，直到找到具有窗口句柄的控件或窗体。The method searches up the control's parent chain until it finds a control or form that has a window handle if the current control's underlying window handle does not exist yet. 如果找不到合适的句柄， 方法将引发异常。If no appropriate handle can be found, the method will throw an exception. 调用期间引发的异常将传播回调用方。Exceptions that are raised during the call will be propagated back to the caller. > [!NOTE] > 除了 属性，控件上有四种线程安全方法： 、、和 （如果已创建控件的句柄）。In addition to the property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: , , , and if the handle for the control has already been created. 在后台线程上创建控件句柄之前调用 可能导致非法的跨线程调用。Calling before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls. 对于所有其他方法调用，应使用调用方法之一封送对控件线程的调用。For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread. 委托可以是 的实例，在这种情况下，发送方参数将包含此控件，事件参数将包含 。The delegate can be an instance of , in which case the sender parameter will contain this control, and the event parameter will contain . 委托还可以是 的实例，也可以是使用 void 参数列表的任何其他委托。The delegate can also be an instance of , or any other delegate that takes a void parameter list. 对 或 委托的调用将比调用另一个委托类型的速度更快。A call to an or delegate will be faster than a call to another type of delegate. > [!NOTE] > 如果应处理消息的线程不再处于活动状态，则可能会引发异常。An exception might be thrown if the thread that should process the message is no longer active. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示包含委托的控件。The following code example shows controls that contain a delegate. 委托封装一个方法，该方法将项添加到列表框中，在拥有该窗体的基础句柄的线程上执行此方法。The delegate encapsulates a method that adds items to the list box, and this method is executed on the thread that owns the underlying handle of the form. 当用户单击该按钮时，`Invoke` 将运行该委托。When the user clicks on the button, `Invoke` runs the delegate. [!code-cpp[Control_Invoke2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_Invoke2/CPP/control_invoke2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control_Invoke2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_Invoke2/CS/control_invoke2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control_Invoke2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_Invoke2/VB/control_invoke2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 委托类似于 C 或C++语言中的函数指针。Delegates are similar to function pointers in C or C++ languages. 委托封装对委托对象内的方法的引用。Delegates encapsulate a reference to a method inside a delegate object. 然后，可以将委托对象传递给调用所引用的方法的代码，在编译时要调用的方法可能是未知的。The delegate object can then be passed to code that calls the referenced method, and the method to be invoked can be unknown at compile time. 与 C 或C++中的函数指针不同，委托是面向对象的、类型安全且更安全。Unlike function pointers in C or C++, delegates are object-oriented, type-safe, and more secure. 如果该控件的句柄尚不存在，则此方法将在该控件的父链中向上搜索，直到找到具有窗口句柄的控件或窗体。If the control's handle does not exist yet, this method searches up the control's parent chain until it finds a control or form that does have a window handle. 如果找不到合适的句柄，则此方法将引发异常。If no appropriate handle can be found, this method throws an exception. 调用期间引发的异常将传播回调用方。Exceptions that are raised during the call will be propagated back to the caller. > [!NOTE] > 除了 属性，控件上有四种线程安全方法： 、、和 （如果已创建控件的句柄）。In addition to the property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: , , , and if the handle for the control has already been created. 在后台线程上创建控件句柄之前调用 可能导致非法的跨线程调用。Calling before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls. 对于所有其他方法调用，应使用调用方法之一封送对控件线程的调用。For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread. 委托可以是 的实例，在这种情况下，发送方参数将包含此控件，事件参数将包含 。The delegate can be an instance of , in which case the sender parameter will contain this control, and the event parameter will contain . 委托还可以是 的实例，也可以是使用 void 参数列表的任何其他委托。The delegate can also be an instance of , or any other delegate that takes a void parameter list. 对 或 委托的调用将比调用另一个委托类型的速度更快。A call to an or delegate will be faster than a call to another type of delegate. > [!NOTE] > 如果应处理消息的线程不再处于活动状态，则可能会引发异常。An exception might be thrown if the thread that should process the message is no longer active. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示包含委托的控件。The following code example shows controls that contain a delegate. 委托封装一个方法，该方法将项添加到列表框中，并使用指定的参数在拥有该窗体的基础句柄的线程上执行此方法。The delegate encapsulates a method that adds items to the list box, and this method is executed on the thread that owns the underlying handle of the form, using the specified arguments. 当用户单击该按钮时，`Invoke` 将运行该委托。When the user clicks on the button, `Invoke` runs the delegate. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InvokeRequired As Boolean
public: property bool InvokeRequired { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示调用方在对控件进行方法调用时是否必须调用 Invoke 方法，因为调用方位于创建控件所在的线程以外的线程中。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the caller must call an invoke method when making method calls to the control because the caller is on a different thread than the one the control was created on.

value.span: 如果控件的 是在与调用线程不同的线程上创建的（说明您必须通过 Invoke 方法对控件进行调用），则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control's was created on a different thread than the calling thread (indicating that you must make calls to the control through an invoke method); otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows 窗体中的控件绑定到特定的线程，并且不是线程安全的。Controls in Windows Forms are bound to a specific thread and are not thread safe. 因此，如果从其他线程调用控件的方法，则必须使用控件的一个调用方法将调用封送到正确的线程。Therefore, if you are calling a control's method from a different thread, you must use one of the control's invoke methods to marshal the call to the proper thread. 此属性可用于确定是否必须调用 invoke 方法，这在您不知道哪个线程拥有控件时很有用。This property can be used to determine if you must call an invoke method, which can be useful if you do not know what thread owns a control. > [!NOTE] > 除了 属性，控件上有四个方法可安全调用的方法： 、、 和 （如果已创建控件的句柄）。In addition to the property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe to call: ,, and if the handle for the control has already been created. 在后台线程上创建控件句柄之前调用 可能导致非法的跨线程调用。Calling before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls. 对于所有其他方法调用，在从其他线程调用时，应使用这些调用方法之一。For all other method calls, you should use one of these invoke methods when calling from a different thread. 如果该控件的句柄尚不存在，则 在控件的父链中向上搜索，直到找到具有窗口句柄的控件或窗体。If the control's handle does not yet exist, searches up the control's parent chain until it finds a control or form that does have a window handle. 如果找不到合适的句柄，则 方法返回 `false`。If no appropriate handle can be found, the method returns `false`. 这意味着，如果 不是必需的（调用发生在同一线程上），或者如果控件是在另一个线程上创建的，但尚未创建控件的句柄，则 可以返回 `false`。This means that can return `false` if is not required (the call occurs on the same thread), or if the control was created on a different thread but the control's handle has not yet been created. 如果尚未创建控件的句柄，则不应只调用控件上的属性、方法或事件。In the case where the control's handle has not yet been created, you should not simply call properties, methods, or events on the control. 这可能会导致在后台线程上创建控件的句柄，将控件隔离到没有消息泵的线程上并使应用程序不稳定。This might cause the control's handle to be created on the background thread, isolating the control on a thread without a message pump and making the application unstable. 当 在后台线程上返回 `false` 时，还可以通过检查 的值来防范这种情况。You can protect against this case by also checking the value of when returns `false` on a background thread. 如果尚未创建控件句柄，则必须等待，直到在调用 或 之前已创建该控件句柄。If the control handle has not yet been created, you must wait until it has been created before calling or . 通常情况下，仅当在应用程序的主窗体的构造函数中创建了后台线程时（如 `Application.Run(new MainForm())`中所示，在显示窗体或调用 `Application.Run` 之前，会发生这种情况。Typically, this happens only if a background thread is created in the constructor of the primary form for the application (as in `Application.Run(new MainForm())`, before the form has been shown or `Application.Run` has been called. 一种解决方案是等到窗体的句柄创建完毕后再启动后台线程。One solution is to wait until the form's handle has been created before starting the background thread. 可以通过调用 属性来强制创建句柄，或等待 事件启动后台进程。Either force handle creation by calling the property, or wait until the event to start the background process. 更好的解决方案是使用 返回的 `SynchronizationContext`，而不是使用用于跨线程封送处理的控件。An even better solution is to use the `SynchronizationContext` returned by rather than a control for cross-thread marshaling. > [!NOTE] > 如果应处理消息的线程不再处于活动状态，则可能会引发异常。An exception might be thrown if the thread that should process the message is no longer active. 有关多线程 Windows 窗体控件的详细信息，请参阅[如何：使用后台线程搜索文件](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-use-a-background-thread-to-search-for-files)和[如何：对 Windows 窗体控件进行线程安全调用](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-make-thread-safe-calls-to-windows-forms-controls)。For more information about multithreaded Windows Forms controls, see [How to: Use a Background Thread to Search for Files](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-use-a-background-thread-to-search-for-files) and [How to: Make Thread-Safe Calls to Windows Forms Controls](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-make-thread-safe-calls-to-windows-forms-controls).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性返回 `true`，则将释放该控件，并且不能再将其作为有效的 Windows 控件进行引用。When this property returns `true`, the control is disposed of and can no longer be referenced as a valid Windows control. 即使控件的实例被释放，它仍将保留在内存中，直到通过垃圾回收从内存中删除。Even though the instance of a control is disposed of, it is still maintained in memory until it is removed from memory through garbage collection. 释放控件后，将无法调用其 方法。When a control is disposed, you cannot call its method.

span.span: if the character should be sent directly to the control and not preprocessed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 方法，以确定 `charCode` 参数指定的字符是否是控件所需的输入字符。Call the method to determine whether the character specified by the `charCode` parameter is an input character that the control wants. 此方法在窗口消息预处理过程中调用，以确定应将指定的输入字符预处理还是直接发送到控件。This method is called during window message preprocessing to determine whether the specified input character should be preprocessed or sent directly to the control. 如果 返回 `true`，则将指定的字符直接发送到控件。If returns `true`, the specified character is sent directly to the control. 如果 返回 `false`，则将对指定字符进行预处理，并且仅在预处理阶段不使用该字符时才将其发送到控件。If returns `false`, the specified character is preprocessed and only sent to the control if it is not consumed by the preprocessing phase. 字符的预处理包括检查字符是否为另一个控件的助记键。The preprocessing of a character includes checking whether the character is a mnemonic of another control.

span.span: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.

returns.span: 如果指定的键是常规输入键，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the specified key is a regular input key; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 方法，以确定 `keyData` 参数指定的密钥是否是控件所需的输入键。Call the method to determine whether the key specified by the `keyData` parameter is an input key that the control wants. 此方法在窗口消息预处理过程中调用，以确定应将指定的输入键预处理还是直接发送到控件。This method is called during window message preprocessing to determine whether the specified input key should be preprocessed or sent directly to the control. 如果 返回 `true`，则将指定的键直接发送到控件。If returns `true`, the specified key is sent directly to the control. 如果 返回 `false`，则将对指定的键进行预处理，并且仅在预处理阶段不使用它时将其发送到控件。If returns `false`, the specified key is preprocessed and only sent to the control if it is not consumed by the preprocessing phase. 预处理的键包括 TAB、RETURN、ESC 和向上键、向下键、向左键和向右键。Keys that are preprocessed include the TAB, RETURN, ESC, and the UP ARROW, DOWN ARROW, LEFT ARROW, and RIGHT ARROW keys. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 控件的 方法。The following code example shows you how to override the method for a control. 在此示例中，`TabTextBox` 类处理 TAB 键。In this example, the `TabTextBox` class handles the TAB key. 当 `TabTextBox` 具有焦点并且用户按 TAB 键时，将在文本插入点处添加四个空格，并替换任何选定的文本。When the `TabTextBox` has the focus and the user presses the TAB key four spaces are added at the text insertion point, replacing any selected text. 默认情况下， 控件通过将输入焦点移到下一个控件来处理 TAB 键。By default, the control handles the TAB key by moving the input focus to the next control. 在这种情况下，按键从不到达 方法重写。In this case, the keypress never reaches the method override. 若要防止此默认行为，当用户按 TAB 键时， 方法重写将返回 `true`。To prevent this default behavior, the method override returns `true` when the user presses the TAB key. 对于所有其他 keypresses， 方法重写返回调用方法的基类版本的结果。For all other keypresses, the method override returns the result of calling the base-class version of the method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey/cs/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey/vb/form1.vb#0)]

summary.span: 在控件有焦点的情况下按下键时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a key is pressed while the control has focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 键事件按以下顺序发生：Key events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 若要仅在窗体级别处理键盘事件，而不允许其他控件接收键盘事件，请将窗体的 事件处理方法中的 属性设置为 `true`。To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable other controls to receive keyboard events, set the property in your form's event-handling method to `true`. 某些键（如 TAB、RETURN、ESC 和箭头键）会自动由控件处理。Certain keys, such as the TAB, RETURN, ESC, and arrow keys are handled by controls automatically. 若要使这些键引发 事件，必须重写窗体上每个控件中的 方法。To have these keys raise the event, you must override the method in each control on your form. 用于重写 的代码需要确定是否已按某个特殊键，并返回一个 `true`值。The code for the override of the would need to determine if one of the special keys is pressed and return a value of `true`. 您可以处理 事件，并将 属性设置为 `true`，而不是重写 方法。Instead of overriding the method, you can handle the event and set the property to `true`. 有关代码示例，请参阅 事件。For a code example, see the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 事件确定输入到控件中的字符的类型。The following code example uses the event to determine the type of character entered into the control. [!code-cpp[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/VB/form1.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示了引发 、 事件的顺序，以及如何在这些事件上注册事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates the order of raising the , , events, and how to register event handlers on them. [!code-csharp[Control.KeyDown#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/CS/form2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.KeyDown#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/VB/Form2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 键事件按以下顺序发生：Key events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 不是由空格和 backspace 以外的非字符键引发 事件;但是，非字符键会引发 和 事件。The event is not raised by non-character keys other than space and backspace; however, the non-character keys do raise the and events. 使用 属性在运行时采样击键，并使用或修改一小部分击键。Use the property to sample keystrokes at run time and to consume or modify a subset of common keystrokes. 若要仅在窗体级别处理键盘事件，而不允许其他控件接收键盘事件，请将窗体的 事件处理方法中的 属性设置为 `true`。To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable other controls to receive keyboard events, set the property in your form's event-handling method to `true`. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 事件来防止字符进入控件。The following code example uses the event to prevent characters from entering the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 键事件按以下顺序发生：Key events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 若要仅在窗体级别处理键盘事件，而不允许其他控件接收键盘事件，请将窗体的 事件处理方法中的 属性设置为 `true`。To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable other controls to receive keyboard events, set the property in your form's event-handling method to `true`. 某些键（如 TAB、RETURN、ESC 和箭头键）会自动由控件处理。Certain keys, such as the TAB, RETURN, ESC, and arrow keys are handled by controls automatically. 若要使这些键引发 事件，必须重写窗体上每个控件中的 方法。To have these keys raise the event, you must override the method in each control on your form. 重写的代码需要确定是否按下了一个特殊键，并返回一个 `true`值。The code for the override of would need to determine if one of the special keys is pressed and return a value of `true`. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用带有 类的 事件向用户显示弹出式样式帮助。The following code example uses the event with the class to display pop-up style help to the user. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当添加或删除子控件、当控件的边界发生更改时，以及当发生其他可能会影响控件布局的更改时，将发生 事件。The event occurs when child controls are added or removed, when the bounds of the control changes, and when other changes occur that can affect the layout of the control. 可以使用 和 方法取消布局事件。The layout event can be suppressed using the and methods. 暂停布局使你可以对控件执行多个操作，而无需对每个更改执行布局。Suspending layout enables you to perform multiple actions on a control without having to perform a layout for each change. 例如，如果调整控件大小和移动控件，每个操作都将引发 事件。For example, if you resize and move a control, each operation would raise a event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例在 事件中将 在屏幕上居中。The following code example centers a on the screen in the event. 这会使窗体在用户调整其大小时保持居中。This will keep the form centered as the user resizes it. 此示例要求您已创建 控件。This example requires that you have created a control. [!code-cpp[Control.Layout#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Layout/CPP/layout.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.Layout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Layout/CS/layout.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.Layout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Layout/VB/layout.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用键盘（TAB、SHIFT + TAB 等）更改焦点时，通过调用 或 方法，或者通过将 属性设置为当前窗体，焦点事件会按以下顺序发生：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the or methods, or by setting the property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 使用鼠标或通过调用 方法更改焦点时，焦点事件将按以下顺序发生：When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the method, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 如果 属性设置为 `false`，则将取消 和 事件。If the property is set to `false`, the and events are suppressed. > [!NOTE] > 类抑制 和 事件。The and events are suppressed by the class. 类中的等效事件是 和 事件。The equivalent events in the class are the and events. 和 事件具有层次结构，并将在父链上向上和向下，直到达到适当的控件。The and events are hierarchical and will cascade up and down the parent chain until the appropriate control is reached. 例如，假设有一个具有两个 控件的 ，并且每个 控件都有一个 控件。For example, assume you have a with two controls, and each control has one control. 当插入符号从一个 移动到另一个时，将为 和 引发 事件，并为另一个 和 引发 事件。When the caret is moved from one to the other, the event is raised for the and , and the event is raised for the other and . > [!CAUTION] > 不要尝试从 、、、、或 事件处理程序中设置焦点。Do not attempt to set focus from within the , , , , , or event handlers. 这样做可能会导致您的应用程序或操作系统停止响应。Doing so can cause your application or the operating system to stop responding. 有关详细信息，请参阅[WM_KILLFOCUS](/windows/win32/inputdev/wm-killfocus)主题。For more information, see the [WM_KILLFOCUS](/windows/win32/inputdev/wm-killfocus) topic. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 事件将控件重置为其以前的状态。The following code example uses the event to reset a control to its former state. remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于 类是值类型（在 Visual Basic 中`Structure`，`struct` 在视觉对象C#中），因此它按值返回，这意味着访问属性将返回控件左上角的副本。Because the class is a value type (`Structure` in Visual Basic, `struct` in Visual C#), it is returned by value, meaning accessing the property returns a copy of the upper-left point of the control. 因此，调整从此属性返回的 的 或 属性将不会影响该控件的 、、或 属性值。So, adjusting the or properties of the returned from this property will not affect the , , , or property values of the control. 若要调整这些属性，请分别设置每个属性值，或使用新的 设置 属性。To adjust these properties set each property value individually, or set the property with a new . 如果 为 ，则 属性值表示屏幕坐标中的 的左上角。If the is a , the property value represents the upper-left corner of the in screen coordinates. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建 ，并设置其一些公共属性。The following code example creates a and sets some of its common properties. 该示例创建一个 并在 "分组" 框中设置其 。The example creates a and sets its within the group box. 接下来，它设置分组框的 属性，并将该组框停靠到窗体的顶部。Next, it sets the property of the group box, and docks the group box to the top of the form. 最后，它通过将 属性设置为 `false`来禁用分组框，这将导致禁用组框中包含的所有控件。Lastly, it disables the group box by setting the property to `false`, which causes all controls contained within the group box to be disabled. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用键盘（TAB、SHIFT + TAB 等）更改焦点时，通过调用 或 方法，或者通过将 属性设置为当前窗体，焦点事件会按以下顺序发生：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the or methods, or by setting the property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 使用鼠标或通过调用 方法更改焦点时，焦点事件将按以下顺序发生：When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the method, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 如果 属性设置为 `false`，则将取消 和 事件。If the property is set to `false`, the and events are suppressed. 如果 的 属性设置为 事件委托中的 `true`，则将抑制 事件之后通常会发生的所有事件。If the property of the is set to `true` in the event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the event are suppressed. > [!NOTE] > 和 事件是与 WM_KILLFOCUS 和 WM_SETFOCUS Windows 消息相关联的低级别焦点事件。The and events are low-level focus events that are tied to the WM_KILLFOCUS and WM_SETFOCUS Windows messages. 通常，仅当更新 或编写自定义控件时，才使用 和 事件。Typically, the and events are only used when updating or when writing custom controls. 相反， 和 事件应该用于除 类之外的所有控件，后者使用 和 事件。Instead the and events should be used for all controls except the class, which uses the and events. 有关 和 事件的详细信息，请参阅[WM_KILLFOCUS](/windows/win32/inputdev/wm-killfocus)和[WM_KILLFOCUS](/windows/win32/inputdev/wm-killfocus)主题。For more information about the and events, see the [WM_KILLFOCUS](/windows/win32/inputdev/wm-killfocus) and [WM_KILLFOCUS](/windows/win32/inputdev/wm-killfocus) topics. > [!CAUTION] > 不要尝试从 、、、、或 事件处理程序中设置焦点。Do not attempt to set focus from within the , , , , , or event handlers. 这样做可能会导致您的应用程序或操作系统停止响应。Doing so can cause your application or the operating system to stop responding. 有关详细信息，请参阅[WM_KILLFOCUS](/windows/win32/inputdev/wm-killfocus)主题。For more information, see the [WM_KILLFOCUS](/windows/win32/inputdev/wm-killfocus) topic. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何验证 TextBox1 的文本。The following code example demonstrates validating the text for TextBox1. 它还演示了如何通过将 属性设置为 TextBox1 中的文本来处理 事件。It also demonstrates handling the event by setting the property to the text in TextBox1. 此代码示例使用 方法在打开文件对话框之前检查错误。The code example used the method to check for an error before opening the file dialog box. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为 `TextBox1`的 的窗体、名为 `OpenFileDialog1`的 、名为 的 `Button1`以及名为 的 `ErrorProvider1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form containing a named `TextBox1`, an named `OpenFileDialog1`, a named `Button1`, and an named `ErrorProvider1`. 确保所有事件都与事件处理程序相关联。Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 、、、、和 成员。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , , , , and members. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到一个名为 Form1 的窗体中，其中包含多个控件。To run the example, paste the following code in a form called Form1 containing several controls. 此示例要求 、和 事件连接到在示例中定义的事件处理程序。This example requires that the , , and events are connected to the event handlers defined in the example. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseCaptureChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 当控件失去鼠标捕获时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control loses mouse capture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在极少数情况下，可能需要检测意外输入。In rare scenarios, you might need to detect unexpected input. 例如，请考虑以下方案。For example, consider the following scenarios. - 在鼠标操作期间，用户通过按 Windows 键或 CTRL + ESC 打开 "开始" 菜单。During a mouse operation, the user opens the Start menu by pressing the Windows key or CTRL+ESC. - 在鼠标操作期间，用户可以通过按 ALT + TAB 切换到另一个程序。During a mouse operation, the user switches to another program by pressing ALT+TAB. - 在鼠标操作过程中，其他程序将显示一个窗口，或者从当前应用程序中获得焦点的消息框。During a mouse operation, another program displays a window or a message box that takes focus away from the current application. 鼠标操作可以包括在窗体或控件上单击和按住鼠标，或执行鼠标拖动操作。Mouse operations can include clicking and holding the mouse on a form or a control, or performing a mouse drag operation. 如果您必须检测窗体或控件何时失去这些和相关的意外方案的鼠标捕获，则可以使用 事件。If you have to detect when a form or a control loses mouse capture for these and related unexpected scenarios, you can use the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 控件的 事件。The following code example demonstrates the event for a control. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseCaptureChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.control.mousecapturechanged/cs/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseCaptureChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.control.mousecapturechanged/vb/form1.vb#1)] 若要测试此示例，请按 F5 在调试器中运行该示例。To test this example, run it in the debugger by pressing F5. 在 Visual Studio 中打开 "**输出**" 窗口，以便可以查看事件的引发时间。Open the **Output** window in Visual Studio so that you can see when events are raised. 单击 ，并注意以下输出。Click the and notice the following output. `button1_MouseDown` `button1_MouseUp` `button1_MouseCaptureChanged` 现在，在 控件上单击并按住鼠标左键。Now, click and hold the left mouse button on the control. 如果仍单击鼠标，请按 ALT + TAB 切换到另一个程序。While still clicking the mouse, press ALT+TAB to switch to another program. 请注意，会引发 事件，使您能够处理这种情况。Notice that the event is raised enabling you to potentially handle this scenario. 根据您的操作，可能不会引发 事件。Depending on your actions, the event might not be raised. 还可以通过 Windows 键或 CTRL + ESC 尝试此测试。You can also try this test with the Windows key or CTRL+ESC. `button1_MouseDown` `button1_MouseCaptureChanged`

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseClick As MouseEventHandler

summary.span: 用鼠标单击控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control is clicked by the mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当光标位于控件上方时，按下鼠标按钮通常会引发控件中的以下一系列事件：Depressing a mouse button when the cursor is over a control typically raises the following series of events from the control: 1. 事件。 event. 2. 事件。 event. 3. 事件。 event. 4. 事件。 event. 为此，不能在控件的类中禁用各种事件。For this to occur, the various events cannot be disabled in the control's class. 按用户操作系统的鼠标设置所确定，两次单击就会足够长时间关闭，这将生成一个 事件，而不是第二个 事件。Two single clicks that occur close enough in time, as determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system, will generate a event instead of the second event. > [!IMPORTANT] > 事件是控件在逻辑上更高的级别事件。 events are logically higher-level events of a control. 它们通常由其他操作引发，例如当控件具有焦点时按 ENTER 键。They are often raised by other actions, such as pressing the ENTER key when the control has focus. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到一个项目中，该项目包含继承自 的类型的实例，如 或 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后，将该实例命名为 `Control1` 并确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#54](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#54)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#54](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#54)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseDoubleClick As MouseEventHandler

summary.span: 用鼠标双击控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control is double clicked by the mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当光标位于控件上时，如果用户快速连续两次 depresses 鼠标按钮，则会发生 事件。The event occurs when the user depresses a mouse button twice in quick succession when the cursor is over the control. 双击两次单击的时间间隔是由用户操作系统的鼠标设置确定的。The time interval that separates two single clicks from a double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system. 当发生此类用户操作时，控件将引发以下序列事件：The following series of events is raised by the control when such a user action takes place: 1. 事件。 event. 2. 事件。 event. 3. 事件。 event. 4. 事件。 event. 5. 事件。 event. 6. 事件。 event. 7. 事件。 event. 8. 事件。 event. 为此，不能在控件的类中禁用各种事件。For this to occur, the various events cannot be disabled in the control's class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 事件是控件在逻辑上更高的级别事件。 events are logically higher-level events of a control. 它们可能由其他用户操作（如快捷键组合）引发。They may be raised by other user actions, such as shortcut key combinations. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到一个项目中，该项目包含继承自 的类型的实例，如 或 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后，将该实例命名为 `Control1` 并确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#55](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#55)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#55](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#55)]

summary.span: 当鼠标指针位于控件上并按下鼠标键时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the mouse pointer is over the control and a mouse button is pressed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 鼠标事件按下列顺序发生：Mouse events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. / / 4. 5. > [!NOTE] > 除非 集合中至少有一个 ，否则不会为 类引发以下事件： 、、、、、、 和 。The following events are not raised for the class unless there is at least one in the collection: , , , , , , and . 如果集合中至少有一个 ，并且用户与选项卡控件的标头（显示 名称）交互， 将引发相应的事件。If there is at least one in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the names appear), the raises the appropriate event. 但是，如果用户交互位于选项卡页的工作区中，则 引发相应的事件。However, if the user interaction is within the client area of the tab page, the raises the appropriate event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用不同的鼠标事件在 上绘制鼠标的路径。The following code example demonstrates using different mouse events to draw the path of the mouse on a . 将在每个 的 中添加一条线段，并 事件发生。A line segment is added to the for each and events that occur. 若要更新图形，请针对每个 `MouseDown` 和 `MouseUp` 事件的 调用 方法。To update the graphics, the method is called for the on each `MouseDown` and `MouseUp` event. 此外，当 事件发生时，图形路径会向上或向下滚动。In addition, the graphic path is scrolled up or down when the event occurs. 还会在屏幕上标识其他鼠标事件，如 。Additional mouse events, like , are identified on screen as well. 屏幕上还显示有关 类中鼠标的其他信息。Also displayed on the screen is additional information about the mouse from the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent/CPP/mouseeventexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent/CS/mouseeventexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent/VB/mouseeventexample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的典型用法是在鼠标悬停在控件的指定区域内的控件（"悬停矩形"）上时显示工具提示。A typical use of is to display a tool tip when the mouse pauses on a control within a specified area around the control (the "hover rectangle"). 引发此事件所需的暂停由 属性指定，以毫秒为单位。The pause required for this event to be raised is specified in milliseconds by the property. 在与 和 属性的连接中定义和检测 事件。The event is defined and detected in connection with the and properties. 鼠标事件按下列顺序发生：Mouse events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. / / 4. 5. > [!NOTE] > 除非 集合中至少有一个 ，否则不会为 类引发以下事件： 、、、、、、 和 。The following events are not raised for the class unless there is at least one in the collection: , , , , , , and . 如果集合中至少有一个 ，并且用户与选项卡控件的标头（显示 名称）交互， 将引发相应的事件。If there is at least one in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the names appear), the raises the appropriate event. 但是，如果用户交互位于选项卡页的工作区中，则 引发相应的事件。However, if the user interaction is within the client area of the tab page, the raises the appropriate event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用不同的鼠标事件在 上绘制鼠标的路径。The following code example demonstrates using different mouse events to draw the path of the mouse on a . 将在每个 的 中添加一条线段，并 事件发生。A line segment is added to the for each and events that occur. 若要更新图形，请针对每个 `MouseDown` 和 `MouseUp` 事件的 调用 方法。To update the graphics, the method is called for the on each `MouseDown` and `MouseUp` event. 此外，当 事件发生时，图形路径会向上或向下滚动。In addition, the graphic path is scrolled up or down when the event occurs. 还会在屏幕上标识其他鼠标事件，如 。Additional mouse events, like , are identified on screen as well. 屏幕上还显示有关 类中鼠标的其他信息。Also displayed on the screen is additional information about the mouse from the class. public: static property System::Drawing::Point MousePosition { System::Drawing::Point get(); };

summary.span: 获取鼠标光标的位置（以屏幕坐标表示）。

span.span: Gets the position of the mouse cursor in screen coordinates.

value.span: ，它包含鼠标光标相对于屏幕左上角的坐标。

span.span: A that contains the coordinates of the mouse cursor relative to the upper-left corner of the screen.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回一个表示引用属性时鼠标光标位置的 。The property returns a that represents the mouse cursor position at the time the property was referenced. 坐标指示屏幕上的位置，而不是相对于控件的位置，而无论光标是否定位在控件上，都将返回。The coordinates indicate the position on the screen, not relative to the control, and are returned regardless of whether the cursor is positioned over the control. 屏幕左上角的坐标为0，0。The coordinates of the upper-left corner of the screen are 0,0. 属性与 属性相同。The property is identical to the property. ## Examples 当鼠标光标位于树节点上时，如果用户按 ALT + E，则下面的代码示例将 标签变为可编辑状态。The following code example puts a label into an editable state when the user presses ALT+E while the mouse cursor is over the tree node. 用户编辑标签后，不能再次编辑标签，直到再次按 ALT + E 组合键。After the user is done editing the label, the labels cannot be edited again until the ALT+E key combination is pressed again. 此示例要求 上有 。This example requires that you have a on a . 树视图还应该至少有一个 集合。The tree view should also have at least one in its collection. summary.span: 在鼠标指针在控件上并释放鼠标键时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the mouse pointer is over the control and a mouse button is released.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 鼠标事件按下列顺序发生：Mouse events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. / / 4. 5. > [!NOTE] > 除非 集合中至少有一个 ，否则不会为 类引发以下事件： 、、、、、、 和 。The following events are not raised for the class unless there is at least one in the collection: , , , , , , and . 如果集合中至少有一个 ，并且用户与选项卡控件的标头（显示 名称）交互， 将引发相应的事件。If there is at least one in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the names appear), the raises the appropriate event. 但是，如果用户交互位于选项卡页的工作区中，则 引发相应的事件。However, if the user interaction is within the client area of the tab page, the raises the appropriate event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用不同的鼠标事件在 上绘制鼠标的路径。The following code example demonstrates using different mouse events to draw the path of the mouse on a . 将在每个 的 中添加一条线段，并 事件发生。A line segment is added to the for each and events that occur. 若要更新图形，请针对每个 `MouseDown` 和 `MouseUp` 事件的 调用 方法。To update the graphics, the method is called for the on each `MouseDown` and `MouseUp` event. 此外，当 事件发生时，图形路径会向上或向下滚动。In addition, the graphic path is scrolled up or down when the event occurs. 还会在屏幕上标识其他鼠标事件，如 。Additional mouse events, like , are identified on screen as well. 屏幕上还显示有关 类中鼠标的其他信息。Also displayed on the screen is additional information about the mouse from the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent/CPP/mouseeventexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent/CS/mouseeventexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent/VB/mouseeventexample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseWheel As MouseEventHandler

summary.span: 在控件有焦点且鼠标轮移动时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the mouse wheel moves while the control has focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理 事件时，请务必遵循与鼠标滚轮关联的用户界面（UI）标准。When handling the event it is important to follow the user interface (UI) standards associated with the mouse wheel. 属性值指示鼠标滚轮的移动量。The property value indicates the amount the mouse wheel has been moved. 当累计增量为 + 或减120时，UI 应滚动。The UI should scroll when the accumulated delta is plus or minus 120. UI 应滚动每个已达到增量值的 属性返回的逻辑行数。The UI should scroll the number of logical lines returned by the property for every delta value reached. 你还可以更平滑地滚动到120单位增量，但该比例应保持不变，即每120个滚动条移动的增量单位 线。You can also scroll more smoothly in smaller that 120 unit increments, however the ratio should remain constant, that is lines scrolled per 120 delta units of wheel movement. 有关处理鼠标轮消息的详细信息，请参阅[WM_MOUSEWHEEL](/windows/win32/inputdev/wm-mousewheel)主题。For more information about handling mouse wheel messages, see the [WM_MOUSEWHEEL](/windows/win32/inputdev/wm-mousewheel) topic. 鼠标事件按下列顺序发生：Mouse events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. / / 4. 5. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用不同的鼠标事件在 上绘制鼠标的路径。The following code example demonstrates using different mouse events to draw the path of the mouse on a . 将在每个 的 中添加一条线段，并 事件发生。A line segment is added to the for each and events that occur. 若要更新图形，请针对每个 `MouseDown` 和 `MouseUp` 事件的 调用 方法。To update the graphics, the method is called for the on each `MouseDown` and `MouseUp` event. 此外，当 事件发生时，图形路径会向上或向下滚动。In addition, the graphic path is scrolled up or down when the event occurs. 还会在屏幕上标识其他鼠标事件，如 。Additional mouse events, like , are identified on screen as well. 屏幕上还显示有关 类中鼠标的其他信息。Also displayed on the screen is additional information about the mouse from the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent/CPP/mouseeventexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent/CS/mouseeventexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent/VB/mouseeventexample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可在运行时用来按名称（而不是类型和编程名称）来计算对象。The property can be used at run time to evaluate the object by name rather than type and programmatic name. 由于 属性返回 类型，因此可以在 case 样式逻辑语句（Visual Basic 中的`Select` 语句、Visual C#和 `switch` 中的 [!INCLUDE[vcprvc](~/includes/vcprvc-md.md)]语句）中计算。Because the property returns a type, it can be evaluated in case-style logic statements (`Select` statement in Visual Basic, `switch` statement in Visual C# and [!INCLUDE[vcprvc](~/includes/vcprvc-md.md)]). ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示在窗体中添加或删除控件时 控件的 。The following code example displays the of a control in a when the control is added or removed from a form. summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个事件引发方法，当 的属性值更改时，将执行该方法。The following code example is an event-raising method that is executed when the property value changes. 类具有多个方法，这些方法具有名称模式 `On`*propertyname*`Changed`，在*propertyname*值更改时引发相应*PropertyName*`Changed` 事件（*PropertyName*表示相应属性的名称）。The class has several methods with the name pattern `On`*PropertyName*`Changed` that raise the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event when the *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property). 下面的代码示例更改了显示货币数据的 派生类的 。The following code example changes the of a derived class displaying currency data. 该示例将文本转换为十进制数字，并在数字为负数时将 更改为 ，如果数字为正，则更改为 。The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the to if the number is negative and to if the number is positive. 此示例要求具有派生自 类的类。This example requires that you have a class that derives from the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个事件引发方法，当 的属性值更改时，将执行该方法。The following code example is an event-raising method that is executed when the property value changes. 类具有多个方法，这些方法具有名称模式 `On`*propertyname*`Changed`，在*propertyname*值更改时引发相应*PropertyName*`Changed` 事件（*PropertyName*表示相应属性的名称）。The class has several methods with the name pattern `On`*PropertyName*`Changed` that raise the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event when the *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property). 下面的代码示例更改了显示货币数据的 派生类的 。The following code example changes the of a derived class displaying currency data. 该示例将文本转换为十进制数字，并在数字为负数时将 更改为 ，如果数字为正，则更改为 。The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the to if the number is negative and to if the number is positive. 此示例要求具有派生自 类的类。This example requires that you have a class that derives from the class. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/CPP/onpropertychangedevents.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/CS/onpropertychangedevents.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/VB/onpropertychangedevents.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 事件将控件重置为其以前的状态。The following code example uses the event to reset a control to its former state. param.name: m
param.span: 一个 ，它表示 Windows 消息。

span.span: A that represents the Windows message.

summary.span: 向控件通知 Windows 消息。

span.span: Notifies the control of Windows messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在 中设置了控件的 `EnableNotifyMessage` 样式位，则调用 方法。The method is called if the control's `EnableNotifyMessage` style bit is set in . 中的 `EnableNotifyMessage` 样式使控件在 方法收到 Windows 消息时得到通知。The `EnableNotifyMessage` style in enables the control to be notified when the method receives a Windows message. 利用此方法，不完全受信任的控件可以侦听 Windows 消息，而无需使消息修改消息。With this method, semi-trusted controls can listen for Windows messages without enabling them to modify the message.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写 时，不需要调用基类的 方法，因为没有初始实现。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, calling the base class's method is not necessary because there is no initial implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 利用 方法，派生类还可以处理事件，而无需附加委托。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用户能够将图像或图像文件拖到窗体上，并在删除它的位置显示它。The following code example enables the user to drag an image or image file onto the form, and have it be displayed at the point on which it is dropped. 重写 方法，以便在每次绘制窗体时重绘图像;否则，只有在下一次重画时才会保留图像。The method is overridden to repaint the image each time the form is painted; otherwise the image would only persist until the next repainting. 事件处理方法确定要拖动到窗体中的数据的类型，并提供相应的反馈。The event-handling method determines the type of data being dragged into the form and provides the appropriate feedback. 如果可从数据创建 ，则 事件处理方法将显示窗体上的图像。The event-handling method displays the image on the form, if an can be created from the data. 由于 和 值是屏幕坐标，因此该示例使用 方法将它们转换为客户端坐标。Because the and values are screen coordinates, the example uses the method to convert them to client coordinates. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations/CPP/imagedrag.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations/CS/imagedrag.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations/VB/imagedrag.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[Control.Paint#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Paint/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.Paint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Paint/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.Paint#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Paint/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: Raises the event when the property value of the control's container changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 利用 方法，派生类还可以处理事件，而无需附加委托。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个事件引发方法，当 的属性值更改时，将执行该方法。The following code example is an event-raising method that is executed when the property value changes. 类具有多个方法，这些方法具有名称模式 `On`*propertyname*`Changed`，在*propertyname*值更改时引发相应*PropertyName*`Changed` 事件（*PropertyName*表示相应属性的名称）。The class has several methods with the name pattern `On`*PropertyName*`Changed` that raise the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event when the *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property). 下面的代码示例更改了显示货币数据的 派生类的 。The following code example changes the of a derived class displaying currency data. 该示例将文本转换为十进制数字，并在数字为负数时将 更改为 ，如果数字为正，则更改为 。The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the to if the number is negative and to if the number is positive. 此示例要求具有派生自 类的类。This example requires that you have a class that derives from the class. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/CPP/onpropertychangedevents.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/CS/onpropertychangedevents.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/VB/onpropertychangedevents.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 利用 方法，派生类还可以处理事件，而无需附加委托。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个事件引发方法，当 的属性值更改时，将执行该方法。The following code example is an event-raising method that is executed when the property value changes. 类具有多个方法，这些方法具有名称模式 `On`*propertyname*`Changed`，在*propertyname*值更改时引发相应*PropertyName*`Changed` 事件（*PropertyName*表示相应属性的名称）。The class has several methods with the name pattern `On`*PropertyName*`Changed` that raise the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event when the *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property). 下面的代码示例更改了显示货币数据的 派生类的 。The following code example changes the of a derived class displaying currency data. 该示例将文本转换为十进制数字，并在数字为负数时将 更改为 ，如果数字为正，则更改为 。The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the to if the number is negative and to if the number is positive. 此示例要求具有派生自 类的类。This example requires that you have a class that derives from the class. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/CPP/onpropertychangedevents.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/CS/onpropertychangedevents.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/VB/onpropertychangedevents.vb#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

Protected Overridable Sub OnParentVisibleChanged (e As EventArgs)
abstract member OnParentVisibleChanged : EventArgs -> unit override this.OnParentVisibleChanged : EventArgs -> unit

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用户能够将图像或图像文件拖到窗体上，并在删除它时显示它。The following code example enables the user to drag an image or image file onto the form, and have it be displayed at the point on it is dropped. 重写 方法，以便在每次绘制窗体时重绘图像;否则，只有在下一次重画时才会保留图像。The method is overridden to repaint the image each time the form is painted; otherwise the image would only persist until the next repainting. 事件处理方法确定要拖动到窗体中的数据的类型，并提供相应的反馈。The event-handling method determines the type of data being dragged into the form and provides the appropriate feedback. 如果可从数据创建 ，则 事件处理方法将显示窗体上的图像。The event-handling method displays the image on the form, if an can be created from the data. 由于 和 值是屏幕坐标，因此该示例使用 方法将它们转换为客户端坐标。Because the and values are screen coordinates, the example uses the method to convert them to client coordinates. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在调度输入消息之前，应用程序的消息循环会调用 来对输入消息进行预处理。 is called by the application's message loop to preprocess input messages before they are dispatched. `msg` 参数的可能值包括 WM_KEYDOWN、WM_SYSKEYDOWN、WM_CHAR 和 WM_SYSCHAR。Possible values for the `msg` parameter are WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_CHAR, and WM_SYSCHAR. 重写 时，控件应返回 `true`，以指示它已处理消息。When overriding , a control should return `true` to indicate that it has processed the message. 对于不是由控件处理的消息，应返回 `base.PreProcessMessage` 的结果。For messages that are not processed by the control, the result of `base.PreProcessMessage` should be returned. 控件通常将重写更专用的方法之一，例如 、、、或 ，而不是重写 。Controls will typically override one of the more specialized methods such as , , , , or instead of overriding .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PreviewKeyDown As PreviewKeyDownEventHandler

summary.span: 在焦点位于此控件上的情况下，当有按键动作时发生（在 事件之前发生）。

span.span: Occurs before the event when a key is pressed while focus is on this control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些按键（如选项卡、回车、ESC 和箭头键）通常会被某些控件忽略，因为它们不被视为输入键按下。Some key presses, such as the TAB, RETURN, ESC, and arrow keys, are typically ignored by some controls because they are not considered input key presses. 例如，默认情况下， 控件将忽略箭头键。For example, by default, a control ignores the arrow keys. 按箭头键通常会导致焦点移到上一个或下一个控件。Pressing the arrow keys typically causes the focus to move to the previous or next control. 箭头键被视为导航键，按这些键通常不会引发 的 事件。The arrow keys are considered navigation keys and pressing these keys typically do not raise the event for a . 不过，按下箭头键 会引发 事件。However, pressing the arrow keys for a does raise the event. 通过处理 的 事件并将 属性设置为 `true`，可以在按下箭头键时引发 事件。By handling the event for a and setting the property to `true`, you can raise the event when the arrow keys are pressed. 但是，如果您处理箭头键，焦点将不再移到上一个或下一个控件。However, if you handle the arrow keys, the focus will no longer move to the previous or next control. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示包含 的 。The following code example demonstrates a that includes a . 当 具有焦点并按向上键或向下箭头键时，将显示 。When the has the focus and you press the UP ARROW or DOWN ARROW keys, the appears. 事件处理程序将在按向上键或向下箭头键时进行检测，并将 属性设置为 `true`。The event handler detects when the UP ARROW or DOWN ARROW keys are pressed and sets the property to `true`. 这会引发 事件，以便显示 。This raises the event so that you can display the . 不应将任何逻辑放在 事件处理程序中，而不是设置 属性。You should not put any logic in the event handler, other than to set the property. 相反，应将逻辑放在 事件处理程序中。Instead, you should put your logic in the event handler. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.control.previewkeydown/cs/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.control.previewkeydown/vb/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在消息预处理过程中调用此方法来处理命令键。This method is called during message preprocessing to handle command keys. 命令键是始终优先于常规输入键的键。Command keys are keys that always take precedence over regular input keys. 命令键的示例包括快捷键和菜单快捷方式。Examples of command keys include accelerators and menu shortcuts. 方法必须返回 `true`，以指示它已处理命令键，或 `false` 以指示该密钥不是命令键。The method must return `true` to indicate that it has processed the command key, or `false` to indicate that the key is not a command key. 仅当控件承载于 Windows 窗体应用程序或 ActiveX 控件中时，才会调用此方法。This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control. 方法首先确定控件是否具有 ，如果是，则允许 处理命令键。The method first determines whether the control has a , and if so, enables the to process the command key. 如果命令键不是菜单快捷方式，并且控件有父级，则将该键传递到父级的 方法。If the command key is not a menu shortcut and the control has a parent, the key is passed to the parent's method. 最终效果是，命令键在控件层次结构中向上 "冒泡"。The net effect is that command keys are "bubbled" up the control hierarchy. 除了用户按下的键外，密钥数据还指示在同一时间按下键的同时按下了哪个修改键。In addition to the key the user pressed, the key data also indicates which, if any, modifier keys were pressed at the same time as the key. 修改键包含 SHIFT、CTRL 和 ALT 键。Modifier keys include the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写 方法时，控件应返回 以指示它已处理该键。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, a control should return to indicate that it has processed the key.

para.span: 对于不是由控件处理的键，应返回调用基类 方法的结果。

span.span: For keys that are not processed by the control, the result of calling the base class's method should be returned.

para.span: 控件很少需要重写此方法（如果需要）。

span.span: Controls will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在消息预处理过程中，将调用此方法来处理对话框字符，如控件助记键。This method is called during message preprocessing to handle dialog characters, such as control mnemonics. 仅当 方法指示控件未处理该字符时，才调用此方法。This method is called only if the method indicates that the control is not processing the character. 方法只是将字符发送到父级的 方法，如果该控件没有父级，则返回 `false`。The method simply sends the character to the parent's method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent. 类将重写此方法以执行对话框字符的实际处理。The class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog characters. 仅当控件承载于 Windows 窗体应用程序或 ActiveX 控件中时，才会调用此方法。This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写 方法时，控件应返回 以指示该方法已处理该字符。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, a control should return to indicate that it has processed the character.

para.span: 对于不是由控件处理的字符，应返回调用基类 方法的结果。

span.span: For characters that are not processed by the control, the result of calling the base class's method should be returned.

para.span: 控件很少需要重写此方法（如果需要）。

span.span: Controls will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 子控件收到键盘消息时，子控件调用此方法。This method is called by a child control when the child control receives a keyboard message. 子控件在为消息生成任何键盘事件之前调用此方法。The child control calls this method before generating any keyboard events for the message. 如果此方法返回 `true`，子控件将认为该消息已处理并且不会生成任何键盘事件。If this method returns `true`, the child control considers the message processed and does not generate any keyboard events. `m` 参数包含要预览的窗口消息。The `m` parameter contains the window message to preview. 属性的可能值为 WM_CHAR、WM_KEYDOWN、WM_SYSKEYDOWN、WM_KEYUP 和 WM_SYSKEYUP。Possible values for the property are WM_CHAR, WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_KEYUP, and WM_SYSKEYUP. 方法只是将字符发送到父级的 方法，如果该控件没有父级，则返回 `false`。The method simply sends the character to the parent's method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent. 类将重写此方法以执行对话框键的实际处理。The class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog keys.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写 方法时，控件应返回 以指示它已处理该键。

para.span: 对于不是由控件处理的键，应返回调用基类 方法的结果。

span.span: For keys that are not processed by the control, the result of calling the base class's method should be returned.
