remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法是为了使控件有机会处理助记键字符。This method is called to give a control the opportunity to process a mnemonic character. 方法应确定控件是否处于用于处理助记键的状态，以及给定字符是否表示助记键。The method should determine whether the control is in a state to process mnemonics and if whether the given character represents a mnemonic. 如果是这样，则该方法应执行与助记键关联的操作，并返回 `true`。If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`. 如果不是，则该方法应返回 `false`。If not, the method should return `false`. 此方法的实现通常使用 方法来确定给定字符是否与控件文本中的助记键匹配。Implementations of this method often use the method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the control's text. 例如：For example: ```csharp if (CanSelect && IsMnemonic(charCode, MyControl.Text) { // Perform action associated with mnemonic. } ``` 方法的这一默认实现只返回 `false`，以指示该控件没有助记键。This default implementation of the method simply returns `false` to indicate that the control has no mnemonic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个 button 类的扩展，该扩展会重写 方法以显示自定义行为。The following code example demonstrates an extension of the button class that overrides the method to exhibit custom behavior. 该示例还演示了如何使用 和 属性。The example also demonstrates the use of the and properties. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到同一文件中的窗体类之后。To run this example paste the following code after a form class, in the same file. 将 `MnemonicButton` 类型的按钮添加到窗体。Add a button of type `MnemonicButton` to the form. summary.span: 在 为辅助功能应用程序提供帮助时发生。

span.span: Occurs when is providing help to accessibility applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你应使用 类，使用户能够通过按 F1 键来调用辅助性对象上的帮助。You should use the class to enable users to invoke help on your accessible object by pressing the F1 key. 使用 提供 中的完整信息。Using the provides you with complete information in the . 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 和 类创建可访问感知的图表控件，以公开辅助性信息。The following code example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控件将两条曲线与图例一起绘制。The control plots two curves along with a legend. 从 `ControlAccessibleObject`派生的 `ChartControlAccessibleObject` 类在 方法中用于为图表控件提供自定义的可访问信息。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 由于图表图例不是实际的基于 的控件，而是由图表控件绘制，因此它不具有任何内置的可访问信息。Since the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not any built-in accessible information. 因此，`ChartControlAccessibleObject` 类会重写 方法，以返回表示图例的每个部分的可访问信息的 `CurveLegendAccessibleObject`。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 当可访问感知的应用程序使用此控件时，控件可以提供必需的可访问信息。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此代码摘录演示如何处理 事件。This code excerpt demonstrates handling the event. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅 类概述。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CPP/chartcontrol.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CS/chartcontrol.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/VB/chartcontrol.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event QueryContinueDrag As QueryContinueDragEventHandler

summary.span: 在拖放操作期间发生，并且允许拖动源确定是否应取消拖放操作。

span.span: Occurs during a drag-and-drop operation and enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 拖放操作期间键盘或鼠标按钮状态发生变化时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state during a drag-and-drop operation. 事件允许拖动源确定是否应取消拖放操作。The event enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled. 下面描述与拖放操作相关的事件的引发方式以及引发时间。The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised. 方法确定当前光标位置下的控件。The method determines the control under the current cursor location. 然后，它会检查控件是否为有效的拖放目标。It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target. 如果控件是有效的拖放目标，则会随指定的拖放效果引发 事件。If the control is a valid drop target, the event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified. 有关拖放效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the enumeration. 跟踪鼠标光标位置、键盘状态和鼠标按钮状态的更改。Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked. - 如果用户移出一个窗口，则引发 事件。If the user moves out of a window, the event is raised. - 如果鼠标进入另一个控件，则引发该控件的 。If the mouse enters another control, the for that control is raised. - 如果鼠标移动但停留在同一个控件中，则引发 事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the event is raised. 如果键盘或鼠标按钮状态发生了更改，则会引发 事件，并确定是继续拖动、删除数据还是根据事件的 的 属性的值来取消操作。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the property of the event's . - 如果 `Continue` 的值，则将引发 事件以继续操作，并将以新效果引发 事件，以便可以设置适当的视觉反馈。If the value of is `Continue`, the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 有关有效放置效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 和 事件是成对的，因此当鼠标移动到放置目标上时，将为用户提供有关鼠标位置的最新反馈。The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position. - 如果 `Drop` 的值，则将删除效果值返回到源，以便源应用程序可以对源数据执行适当的操作;例如，如果是移动操作，则剪切数据。If the value of is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. - 如果 `Cancel` 的值，则会引发 事件。If the value of is `Cancel`, the event is raised. 默认情况下，如果按下了 ESC 键，则 事件会将 设置为 中的 `Cancel`，并在按下左、下或右鼠标按钮时将 设置为 `Drop`。By default, the event sets to `Cancel` in if the ESC key was pressed and sets to `Drop` in if the left, middle, or right mouse button is pressed. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 此代码摘录演示了如何使用 事件来取消拖放操作（如果拖动操作在窗体范围外移动）。This code excerpt demonstrates using the event to cancel the drag-and-drop operation if the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅 方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#6)]

summary.span: 获取或设置与控件关联的窗口区域。

span.span: Gets or sets the window region associated with the control.

value.span: 与控件关联的窗口 。

span.span: The window associated with the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 窗口区域是操作系统允许在其中进行绘制的窗口内的像素的集合。The window region is a collection of pixels within the window where the operating system permits drawing. 操作系统不显示窗口区域外的窗口的任何部分。The operating system does not display any portion of a window that lies outside of the window region. 控件区域的坐标相对于控件的左上角，而不是控件的工作区。The coordinates of a control's region are relative to the upper-left corner of the control, not the client area of the control. > [!NOTE] > 区域包含的像素集合可能是不连续的。The collection of pixels contained with the region can be noncontiguous. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过创建 "舍入" 按钮来使用 "" 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property by creating a round button. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为 `roundButton`的按钮的窗体中。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a button called `roundButton`. 此示例要求 事件连接到示例中定义的事件处理程序。This example requires that the event is connected to the event handler defined in the example. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Resize As EventHandler

summary.span: 在调整控件大小时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control is resized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要确定已调整大小的控件的 ，可以将已注册 方法的 `sender` 参数强制转换为 并获取其 属性（或分别 和 属性）。To determine the of the resized control, you can cast the `sender` parameter of the registered method to a and get its property (or and properties individually). 若要处理自定义布局，请使用 事件，而不是 Resize 事件。To handle custom layouts, use the event instead of the Resize event. 事件是为了响应 事件而引发的，但也用于响应影响控件布局的其他更改。The event is raised in response to a event, but also in response to other changes that affect the layout of the control. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例处理 的 事件。The following code example handles the event of a . 调整窗体的大小时，事件处理程序会确保窗体保持为方形（其 和 保持相等）。When the form is resized, the event handler ensures that the form stays square (its and remain equal). 若要运行此示例，请确保并将此事件处理方法与窗体的 事件相关联。To run this example, make sure and associate this event-handling method with the form's event. summary.span: 恢复通常的布局逻辑。

span.span: Resumes usual layout logic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果存在任何挂起的布局请求，则调用 方法会强制立即进行布局。Calling the method forces an immediate layout if there are any pending layout requests. 当你调整控件的多个属性时，将使用 和 方法来取消多个 事件。The and methods are used in tandem to suppress multiple events while you adjust multiple attributes of the control. 例如，通常会调用 方法，然后设置控件的 、、或 属性，然后调用 方法以使更改生效。For example, you would typically call the method, then set the , , , or properties of the control, and then call the method to enable the changes to take effect. 若要成功调用 ，必须没有挂起的调用 。There must be no pending calls to for to be successfully called. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将两个按钮添加到窗体。The following code example adds two buttons to a form. 该示例通过使用 和 方法来交易添加按钮。The example transactions the addition of the buttons by using the and methods. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果存在任何挂起的布局请求，则调用 方法会强制立即进行布局。Calling the method forces an immediate layout if there are any pending layout requests. `performLayout` 参数设置为 `true`时，如果存在任何挂起的布局请求，则会立即进行布局。When the `performLayout` parameter is set to `true`, an immediate layout occurs if there are any pending layout requests. 当你调整控件的多个属性时，将使用 和 方法来取消多个 事件。The and methods are used in tandem to suppress multiple events while you adjust multiple attributes of the control. 例如，通常会调用 方法，然后设置控件的 、、或 属性，然后调用 方法以使更改生效。For example, you would typically call the method, then set the , , , or properties of the control, and then call the method to enable the changes to take effect. 若要成功调用 ，必须没有挂起的调用 。There must be no pending calls to for to be successfully called. > [!NOTE] > 向父控件添加几个控件时，建议您在初始化要添加的控件之前调用 方法。When adding several controls to a parent control, it is recommended that you call the method before initializing the controls to be added. 向父控件添加控件后，调用 方法。After adding the controls to the parent control, call the method. 这将提高具有许多控件的应用程序的性能。This will increase the performance of applications with many controls.

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是环境属性。The property is an ambient property. 环境属性是一个控件属性，如果未设置，则将从父控件中检索该属性。An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control. 例如，默认情况下， 将具有与其父 相同的 。For example, a will have the same as its parent by default. 有关环境属性的详细信息，请参阅 类或 类概述。For more information about ambient properties, see the class or the class overview. 属性用于从右到左书写语言（例如希伯来语或阿拉伯语）的国际化应用程序。The property is used for international applications where the language is written from right to left, such as Hebrew or Arabic. 如果将此属性设置为 ，则将从右到左显示包含文本的控件元素。When this property is set to , control elements that include text are displayed from right to left. > [!NOTE] > 如果 属性的值在运行时更改，则仅保留原始文本（不包含格式设置）。If the value of the property is changed at run time, only raw text without formatting is preserved. 下面是一些示例，说明控件元素如何受 属性值的影响：The following are a few examples of how control elements are affected by the property value of : - 垂直滚动条显示在滚动控件（例如 、、多行 和 ）的左侧而不是右侧。Vertical scroll bars are displayed on the left side rather than right side of scrollable controls (for example, , , multiline , and ). - 水平滚动条从滚动框（滚动块）右对齐开始。Horizontal scroll bars start with the scroll box (thumb) right-aligned. - 对于 和 控件，将反转由 `CheckAlign` 属性控制的复选框元素对齐方式。The check box element alignment, controlled by the `CheckAlign` property, is reversed for and controls. - 列表框、组合框和 up-down 控件中的项将右对齐。Items in list box, combo box, and up-down controls are right aligned. - "上移" 和 "下移" 按钮在 和 控件上左对齐。Up and down buttons are left-aligned on and controls. - 菜单（、和 ）显示为右对齐。Menus (, , and ) are displayed right-aligned. - 属性不影响 控件上的工具栏按钮或 上的文本对齐方式。The alignment of toolbar buttons on a control or the alignment of text on a is not affected by the property. - 支持从右到左对齐;但是，对 ActiveX 控件的影响取决于控件作者为从右到左显示而实现的支持程度。 supports right-to-left alignment; however, the effect on an ActiveX control depends on the extent to which the control author implemented support for right-to-left display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容器样式控件使用 `directed` 和 `forward` 参数。The `directed` and `forward` parameters are used by container-style controls. 如果 `directed` 参数设置为 `true`，则将计算 `forward` 参数以确定要选择的控件。When the `directed` parameter is set to `true`, the `forward` parameter is evaluated to determine which control to select. 当 `forward` 设置为 `true`时，选择 tab 键顺序中的下一个控件;`false`时，选择 tab 键顺序中的上一个控件。When `forward` is set to `true`, the next control in the tab order is selected; when `false`, the previous control in the tab order is selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将控件的 `Selectable` 样式位设置为 中的 `true`，则 方法将激活 tab 键顺序中的下一个控件，该控件包含在另一个控件中，并且其所有父控件都可见且已启用。The method activates the next control in the tab order if the control's `Selectable` style bit is set to `true` in , it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled. 以下列表中的 Windows 窗体控件不可选择。The Windows Forms controls in the following list are not selectable. 从列表中的控件派生的控件也将无法选择。Controls derived from controls in the list will also not be selectable. - - - - - - - （当控件中不存在链接时） (when there is no link present in the control) 使用键盘（TAB、SHIFT + TAB 等）更改焦点时，通过调用 或 方法，或者通过将 属性设置为当前窗体，焦点事件会按以下顺序发生：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the or methods, or by setting the property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 如果 属性设置为 `false`，则将取消 和 事件。If the property is set to `false`, the and events are suppressed. ## Examples 下面的代码 exampleshows 在包含某些控件的窗体中使用的 方法。The following code exampleshows the method being used in a form that has some controls. 每次单击窗体时，将激活下一个控件。Each time that you click the form, the next control is activated. 属性获取容器控件中当前处于活动状态的控件。The property gets the currently active control in the container control. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.control.selectnextcontrol/cs/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.control.selectnextcontrol/vb/form1.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示了在具有 和其他一些控件的窗体中使用的 方法。The following code example shows the method being used in a form that has a and some other controls. 单击 "" 后，将激活 后的下一个控件。When you click the , the next control after the is activated. 请注意，您必须获取 控件的父级。Notice that you have to get the parent of the control. 由于 不是一个容器，因此直接对 调用 将不会更改激活。Since is not a container, calling directly on the would not change the activation. span.span: Sends the control to the back of the z-order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件移动到 z 顺序的后面。The control is moved to the back of the z-order. 如果控件是另一个控件的子控件，则子控件将移到 z 顺序的后面。If the control is a child of another control, the child control is moved to the back of the z-order. 如果该控件为顶级控件，则除非该控件处于活动状态，否则此方法将不能正常工作。If the control is a top-level control, this method will not work correctly unless the control is active. 顶级控件是一个控件，如 ，它不是另一个控件的子控件。A top-level control is a control, such as a , that is not a child of another control. 活动控件是具有输入焦点的可见控件。An active control is a visible control that has input focus. 若要将 方法与非活动的顶级控件一起使用，请先对控件调用 方法。To use the method with an inactive, top-level control, first call the method on the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，与 `specified` 参数中未包含的界限相对应的参数将与它们的当前值一起传入。Typically, the parameters that correspond to the bounds not included in the `specified` parameter are passed in with their current values. 例如，可以使用对控件的当前实例的引用来传入 属性的 、 或 属性。For example, the , , or the or properties of the property can be passed in with a reference to the current instance of the control. 但是，传入的所有值都将生效并应用于控件。However all values passed in are honored and applied to the control. `boundsSpecified` 参数表示应用程序更改 控件的元素。The `boundsSpecified` parameter represents the elements of the controls changed by your application. 例如，如果更改控件的 ，则 `boundsSpecified` 参数值为 `Size` 值。For example, if you change the of the control, the `boundsSpecified` parameter value is the `Size` value of . 但是，如果根据要设置的 属性对 进行调整，`boundsSpecified` 参数值将是 的 `None` 值。However, if the is adjusted in response to the property being set, the `boundsSpecified` parameter value is the `None` value of . > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows Server 2003 系统上， 的大小受监视器的最大像素宽度和高度的限制。On Windows Server 2003 systems, the size of a is restricted by the maximum pixel width and height of the monitor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将重写 方法，以确保控件保持固定的大小。The following code example overrides the method to ensure that the control remains a fixed size. 此示例要求具有直接或间接派生自 类的类。This example requires that you have a class that is either directly or indirectly derived from the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于 类是值类型（在 Visual Basic 中`Structure`，`struct` 在视觉对象C#中），因此它按值返回，这意味着访问属性将返回控件大小的副本。Because the class is a value type (`Structure` in Visual Basic, `struct` in Visual C#), it is returned by value, meaning accessing the property returns a copy of the size of the control. 因此，调整从此属性返回的 的 或 属性将不会影响控件的 或 。So, adjusting the or properties of the returned from this property will not affect the or of the control. 若要调整控件的 或 ，必须设置控件的 或 属性，或使用新的 设置 属性。To adjust the or of the control, you must set the control's or property, or set the property with a new . > [!NOTE] > 若要保持更好的性能，请不要在其构造函数中设置控件的 。To maintain better performance, do not set the of a control in its constructor. 首选方法是重写 属性。The preferred method is to override the property. > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows Server 2003 系统上， 的大小受监视器的最大像素宽度和高度的限制。On Windows Server 2003 systems, the size of a is restricted by the maximum pixel width and height of the monitor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 添加到窗体中，并设置其一些公共属性。The following code example adds a to a form and sets some of its common properties. 该示例将按钮锚定在窗体右下角，以便在调整窗体大小时保持其相对位置。The example anchors the button to the bottom-right corner of the form so it keeps its relative position as the form is resized. 接下来，它设置 ，并将按钮的大小调整为与 相同。Next it sets the and resizes the button to the same size as the . 然后，该示例将 设置为 `true` 并设置 属性。The example then sets the to `true` and sets the property. 最后，添加一个事件处理程序来处理按钮的 事件。Lastly, it adds an event handler to handle the event of the button. 此示例要求你有一个名为 `imageList1`的 。This example requires that you have an named `imageList1`. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CPP/controlproperties.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CS/controlproperties.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/VB/controlproperties.vb#3)]

summary.span: 在 属性值更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the property value changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最好使用 事件来处理自定义布局。It is preferable to use the event to handle custom layouts. 事件是为了响应 事件而引发的，但在其他情况下，可能需要应用布局。The event is raised in response to events, but also in other conditions when layout might need to be applied. 如果通过编程修改或用户交互更改了 属性，则会引发此事件。This event is raised if the property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 事件。The following code example demonstrates the event. 提供了 控件的实例，可以水平和垂直缩放。An instance of a control has been provided that can be scaled both horizontally and vertically. 实例提供水平和垂直缩放值。A instance provides the horizontal and vertical scale value. 名为**OK**的 实例用于设置 控件实例的刻度值。The instance named **OK** is used to set the scale values for the control instance. 每当控件大小发生更改时，就会调用与控件的 事件关联的事件处理程序。Whenever the size of the control changes, the event handler associated with the event of the control is called. 此事件处理程序将显示一个消息框，指示控件的大小已更改。This event handler displays a message box indicating that the size of the control has changed. [!code-cpp[Control_Scale1#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_Scale1/CPP/control_scale1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Control_Scale1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_Scale1/CS/control_scale1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Control_Scale1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_Scale1/VB/control_scale1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 添加或更改 标志时， 事件发生。The event occurs when flags have been added or changed. 如果编程修改或用户交互更改了控件样式，则会引发此事件。This event is raised if the control style is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到一个项目中，该项目包含继承自 的类型的实例，如 或 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后，将该实例命名为 `Control1` 并确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 临时挂起控件的布局逻辑。

span.span: Temporarily suspends the layout logic for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件的布局逻辑将挂起，直到调用 方法。The layout logic of the control is suspended until the method is called. 当你调整控件的多个属性时，将使用 和 方法来取消多个 事件。The and methods are used in tandem to suppress multiple events while you adjust multiple attributes of the control. 例如，通常会调用 方法，然后设置控件的 、、或 属性，然后调用 方法以使更改生效。For example, you would typically call the method, then set the , , , or properties of the control, and then call the method to enable the changes to take effect. 若要成功调用 ，必须没有挂起的调用 。There must be no pending calls to for to be successfully called. > [!NOTE] > 向父控件添加几个控件时，建议您在初始化要添加的控件之前调用 方法。When adding several controls to a parent control, it is recommended that you call the method before initializing the controls to be added. 向父控件添加控件后，调用 方法。After adding the controls to the parent control, call the method. 这将提高具有许多控件的应用程序的性能。This will increase the performance of applications with many controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将两个按钮添加到窗体。The following code example adds two buttons to a form. 该示例通过使用 和 方法来交易添加按钮。The example transactions the addition of the buttons by using the and methods. summary.span: 获取或设置控件在其容器内的 Tab 键顺序。

span.span: Gets or sets the tab order of the control within its container.

value.span: 控件容器中控件集合内的控件的索引值。

span.span: The index value of the control within the set of controls within its container.

value.span: 容器中包括的控件以 Tab 键顺序排列。

span.span: The controls in the container are included in the tab order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 选项卡索引可以包含任何大于或等于零的有效整数，并按 tab 键顺序提前更小的数字。A tab index can consist of any valid integer greater than or equal to zero, lower numbers being earlier in the tab order. 如果同一个父控件上的多个控件具有相同的选项卡索引，则这些控件的 z 顺序将确定循环遍历控件的顺序。If more than one control on the same parent control has the same tab index, the z-order of the controls determines the order to cycle through the controls. 对于要包含在 tab 键顺序中的控件，其 属性必须设置为 `true`。For a control to be included in the tab order, its property must be set to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 添加到窗体中，并设置其一些公共属性。The following code example adds a to a form and sets some of its common properties. 该示例将按钮锚定在窗体右下角，以便在调整窗体大小时保持其相对位置。The example anchors the button to the bottom-right corner of the form so it keeps its relative position as the form is resized. 接下来，它设置 ，并将按钮的大小调整为与 相同。Next it sets the and resizes the button to the same size as the . 然后，该示例将 设置为 `true` 并设置 属性。The example then sets the to `true` and sets the property. 最后，添加一个事件处理程序来处理按钮的 事件。Lastly, it adds an event handler to handle the event of the button. 此示例要求你有一个名为 `imageList1`的 。This example requires that you have an named `imageList1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自 类的任何类型都可以分配给此属性。Any type derived from the class can be assigned to this property. 如果通过 Windows 窗体设计器设置 属性，则只能分配文本。If the property is set through the Windows Forms designer, only text can be assigned. 属性的常见用途是存储与控件密切关联的数据。A common use for the property is to store data that is closely associated with the control. 例如，如果您具有显示有关客户的信息的控件，则可以将包含客户订单历史记录的 存储在该控件的 属性中，以便可以快速访问数据。For example, if you have a control that displays information about a customer, you might store a that contains the customer's order history in that control's property so the data can be accessed quickly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个窗体，并在其 属性中存储 `Customer`。The following code example displays a form and stores a `Customer` in its property. 此示例要求您定义了一个派生自名为 `CustomerForm` 的类，并且您已定义了一个 `Customer`。This example requires that you have defined a class that derives from named `CustomerForm` and that you have defined a `Customer`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个派生类以不同方式使用控件的 属性。The property of the control is used differently by each derived class. 例如， 的 属性显示在窗体顶部的标题栏中，在字符计数中相当小，通常显示应用程序或文档名称。For example the property of a is displayed in the title bar at the top of the form, is fairly small in character count, and usually displays the application or document name. 不过， 的 属性可能会很大，并且可以包含用于设置文本格式的大量非可视字符。However, the property of a can be large and can include numerous nonvisual characters used to format the text. 例如，可以通过调整 属性或通过添加空格或制表符来对齐文本来设置 中显示的文本的格式。For example, the text displayed in a can be formatted by adjusting the properties, or by the addition of spaces or tab characters to align the text. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建 ，并设置其一些公共属性。The following code example creates a and sets some of its common properties. 该示例创建一个 并在 "分组" 框中设置其 。The example creates a and sets its within the group box. 接下来，它设置分组框的 属性，并将该组框停靠到窗体的顶部。Next, it sets the property of the group box, and docks the group box to the top of the form. 最后，它通过将 属性设置为 `false`来禁用分组框，这将导致禁用组框中包含的所有控件。Lastly, it disables the group box by setting the property to `false`, which causes all controls contained within the group box to be disabled. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CPP/controlproperties.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CS/controlproperties.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/VB/controlproperties.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 顶级控件被定义为不是由另一个 Windows 窗体控件作为父级的父控件。The top-level control is defined as the parent control that is not parented by another Windows Forms control. 通常，这是控件所在的最外面的 。Typically, this is the outermost that the control is contained in. 例如，如果控件包含在 MDI 子 上，则顶级控件为多文档界面（MDI）父 。For example, if the control is contained on an MDI child , then the top-level control is the Multiple Document Interface (MDI) parent . 如果控件不是 上的父级，则此属性将返回 `null`。If the control is not parented on a , this property will return `null`.

span.span: Causes the control to redraw the invalidated regions within its client area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 执行用于绘制的任何挂起的请求。Executes any pending requests for painting. 可以通过两种方式重绘窗体及其内容：There are two ways to repaint a form and its contents: - 可以将 方法的重载之一与 方法一起使用。You can use one of the overloads of the method with the method. - 可以调用 方法，该方法强制控件重绘自身及其所有子级。You can call the method, which forces the control to redraw itself and all its children. 这等效于将 方法设置为 `true` 并将其与 一起使用。This is equivalent to setting the method to `true` and using it with . 方法控制绘制或重绘的内容。The method governs what gets painted or repainted. 方法控制何时发生绘制或重新绘制。The method governs when the painting or repainting occurs. 如果使用 并将 方法一起使用而不是调用 ，则将重新绘制的内容取决于你使用 的哪个重载。If you use the and methods together rather than calling , what gets repainted depends on which overload of you use. 方法只是强制立即绘制控件，而 方法控制在调用 方法时绘制的内容。The method just forces the control to be painted immediately, but the method governs what gets painted when you call the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[WM_PAINT](/windows/win32/gdi/wm-paint)主题。For more information, see the [WM_PAINT](/windows/win32/gdi/wm-paint) topic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当执行需要花费大量时间的操作时，请使用等待光标。Use a wait cursor whenever you perform an operation that takes a noticeable amount of time. 但请注意，阻止 UI 线程的操作也会阻止游标更改。However, note that operations that block the UI thread will also block a cursor change. 因此，只有在另一个线程中执行耗时的操作时，才应使用此属性。Therefore, this property should only be used when performing time-consuming operations in another thread. 若要全局和立即更改游标，请参阅 "" 属性。To change the cursor globally and immediately, see the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用键盘（TAB、SHIFT + TAB 等）更改焦点时，通过调用 或 方法，或者通过将 属性设置为当前窗体，焦点事件会按以下顺序发生：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the or methods, or by setting the property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 使用鼠标或通过调用 方法更改焦点时，焦点事件将按以下顺序发生：When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the method, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 如果 属性设置为 `false`，则将取消 和 事件。If the property is set to `false`, the and events are suppressed. 如果 的 属性设置为 事件委托中的 `true`，则将抑制 事件之后通常会发生的所有事件。If the property of the is set to `true` in the event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the event are suppressed. > [!CAUTION] > 不要尝试从 、、、、或 事件处理程序中设置焦点。Do not attempt to set focus from within the , , , , , or event handlers. 这样做可能会导致您的应用程序或操作系统停止响应。Doing so can cause your application or the operating system to stop responding. 有关详细信息，请参阅 "[关于消息和消息队列](/windows/win32/winmsg/about-messages-and-message-queues)" 主题中的[WM_KILLFOCUS](/windows/win32/winmsg/wm-activateapp)主题和 "消息死锁" 一节。For more information, see the [WM_KILLFOCUS](/windows/win32/winmsg/wm-activateapp) topic, and the "Message Deadlocks" section of the [About Messages and Message Queues](/windows/win32/winmsg/about-messages-and-message-queues) topic. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生类 并验证用户输入的电子邮件地址。The following code example uses the derived class and validates an email address that the user enters. 如果电子邮件地址不是标准格式（包含 "@" and "."），验证将失败，显示 图标，并取消该事件。If the email address is not in the standard format (containing "@" and "."), the validation fails, an icon is displayed, and the event is canceled. 此示例要求在窗体上创建 和 控件。This example requires that a and control have been created on a form. summary.span: 在 属性值更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the property value changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果通过编程修改或用户交互更改了 属性，则会引发此事件。This event is raised if the property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例在 控件的 属性值已更改时引发 事件。The following code example raises the event when the property value of the control has changed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 对 和 属性值所做的更改将导致控件 属性值更改。Changes made to the and property values cause the property value of the control to change. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在窗体上创建三个 控件，并使用各种与大小相关的和与位置相关的属性设置其大小和位置。The following code example creates three controls on a form and sets their size and location by using the various size-related and location-related properties. 此示例要求有一个宽度和高度至少为300像素的 。This example requires that you have a that has a width and height of at least 300 pixels. span.span: The Windows to process.

summary.span: 处理 Windows 消息。

span.span: Processes Windows messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 经过 方法筛选后，所有消息都将发送到 方法。All messages are sent to the method after getting filtered through the method. 方法与 Windows `WindowProc` 函数完全对应。The method corresponds exactly to the Windows `WindowProc` function. 有关处理 Windows 消息的详细信息，请参阅[WindowProc 函数](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=181565)。For more information about processing Windows messages, see the [WindowProc function](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=181565). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法，以处理 结构中标识的操作系统消息。The following code example demonstrates overriding the method to handle operating system messages identified in the structure. 在此示例中处理[WM_ACTIVATEAPP](/windows/win32/winmsg/wm-activateapp)操作系统消息，以了解其他应用程序何时变为活动状态。The [WM_ACTIVATEAPP](/windows/win32/winmsg/wm-activateapp) operating system message is handled in this example to know when another application is becoming active. 请参阅下列主题，了解可用的 、和 值。See the following topics to understand the available , , and values. 可在 Windows .h 头文件中找到实际常数值。Actual constant values can be found in the Windows.h header file. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/VB/form1.vb#1)]

para.span: 继承控件应调用基类的 方法来处理其不处理的所有消息。

span.span: Inheriting controls should call the base class's method to process any messages that they do not handle.
